author: Doris P. Johnson

quote: When God asks a question, it is always rhetorical.
author: Jeannine Atkins, Finding Wonders: Three Girls Who Changed Science

quote: You must know what you need to do every day to carry out your mission
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: A good education must expose knowledge gaps and increase the hunger for further inquiries.A good education is not complete.
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: People who desire to acquire success need to have knowledge
author: Brittany Burgunder

quote: The absence of specific knowledge about success is the reason why your journey along the path to success has been halted
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: The knowledge and successful pursuit of your destiny brings riches into your world
author: George Eliot, Middlemarch

quote: Time well-spent is life well-lived.
author: Rajen Jani, Once Upon A Time: 100 Management Stories

quote: Compromise makes relationships survive.
author: Rajen Jani, Once Upon A Time: 100 Management Stories

quote: Change is difficult, since it challenges the status quo.
author: Rajen Jani, Once Upon A Time: 100 Management Stories

quote: Knowledge is something that fire cannot burn, water cannot wet, air cannot dry, thieves cannot steal, and the more you spend the more it increases.
author: Rajen Jani, Once Upon A Time: 100 Management Stories

quote: Only time can reveal the future.
author: Rajen Jani, Once Upon A Time: 100 Management Stories

quote: Change is possible only if the top management agrees.
author: Rajen Jani

quote: Relationships need to be valued today, for tomorrow is uncertain.
author: Rajen Jani, Once Upon A Time: 100 Management Stories

quote: Time should be spent happily without regrets.
author: Rajen Jani, Once Upon A Time: 100 Management Stories

quote: Acquiring knowledge is the most fruitful effort.
author: Rajen Jani, Once Upon A Time: 100 Management Stories

quote: How one treats another one, determines success.
author: Rajen Jani, Once Upon A Time: 100 Management Stories

quote: Some problems are imaginary and not real.
author: Rajen Jani, Once Upon A Time: 100 Management Stories

quote: Improvements enable adapting to new situations.
author: Rajen Jani, Once Upon A Time: 100 Management Stories

quote: The wise communicate in subtle ways.
author: Rajen Jani, Once Upon A Time: 100 Management Stories

quote: Actions undertaken in anger, only result in pain, sorrow, and regret.
author: Rajen Jani, Once Upon A Time: 100 Management Stories

quote: Improvement combines effectiveness with simplicity.
author: Rajen Jani, Once Upon A Time: 100 Management Stories

quote: Angry issues need settling time.
author: Rajen Jani, Once Upon A Time: 100 Management Stories

quote: Adverse situations used advantageously can offer solutions to problems.
author: Rajen Jani, Once Upon A Time: 100 Management Stories

quote: If the difficult tasks are completed first, then the remaining tasks seem easy.
author: Rajen Jani, Once Upon A Time: 100 Management Stories

quote: Employees are usually motivated to stay or leave due to their managers.
author: Rajen Jani, Once Upon A Time: 100 Management Stories

quote: A positive change in approach improves quality.
author: Rajen Jani, Once Upon A Time: 100 Management Stories

quote: The clearer the objective, the better the performance.
author: Rajen Jani, Once Upon A Time: 100 Management Stories

quote: Growth-oriented performance demands sustained entrepreneurial efforts.
author: Rajen Jani, Once Upon A Time: 100 Management Stories

quote: Criticizing is easy, performing is difficult.
author: Rajen Jani, Once Upon A Time: 100 Management Stories

quote: Sensible motivation is always effective.
author: Rajen Jani, Once Upon A Time: 100 Management Stories

quote: Helping others is an effective way of training oneself.
author: Rajen Jani, Once Upon A Time: 100 Management Stories

quote: The concern of a team member is also the concern of the team.
author: Rajen Jani, Once Upon A Time: 100 Management Stories

quote: A team is more than the sum of the individuals.
author: Abhijit Naskar, The Education Decree

quote: Good sales copy creates good sales.
author: Rajen Jani, Once Upon A Time: 100 Management Stories

quote: Retail selling benefits from aggressive publicity.
author: Abhijit Naskar, The Education Decree

quote: Some team members act as adhesives to unite the team.
author: Topsy Gift

quote: What one person calls miracle, I call nature.
author: Empedocles

quote: The kingdom of God is within you
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: If seek the light of knowledge of God, we know how to live.
author: R.W. Erskine

quote: In spiritually arid centuries, the only man to realize that the century is dying from thirst is the man who still harnesses an underground spring.
author: Hisham Fawzi

quote: Who controls the words controls your thoughts.
author: Roshan Sharma

quote: If you have knowledge, then use it for educating not for degrading.
author: Ted Hughes, Poetry in the Making: An Anthology

quote: Travelling the road will tell you more about the road than the google will tell you about the road.
author: Michael Bassey Johnson, Master of Maxims

quote: Life is not only about acquiring knowledge, it is about applying knowledge.
author: Criss Jami

quote: In a time of turbulence and change, it is more true than ever that knowledge is power.
author: Pamela Dean

quote: Every child ought to know the light of knowledge.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: With the wings of knowledge, it is easier to fly toward the blue sky of wisdom.
author: J.W. Dunne, An Experiment with Time

quote: A leader’s skills take him to people, but his character brings people to him.
author: Fahad Rashiq

quote: You can’t give what you don’t have. To lead people in a better way, mingle with them in body. But in knowledge, be far ahead of them!
author: Eraldo Banovac

quote: God gives wisdom, knowledge and understanding.
author: Matthew Donnelly

quote: The greatest education is the knowledge of God. God gives life, strength and wisdom for every accomplishment.
author: Will Advise

quote: The knowledge that makes us cherish innocence makes innocence unattainable.
author: Meg Wolitzer

quote: Autumn is a momentum of the natures golden beauty…, so the same it’s time to find your momentum of life
author: Rashedur Ryan Rahman

quote: CONFIDENCE is not showing off your VANITY, it’s about to be HUMBLED and KIND to others what are you truly SKILLED and PROFESSIONAL about…
author: H.G. Wells

quote: If we knew what is already there, there will be no need for research.
author: Justin K. McFarlane Beau

quote: There are three characteristics of wisdom: knowledge, experience and patience.
author: Dan Smith, The State of the World Atlas

quote: It is better to fail in originality than to succeed in imitation.
author: Salvador Dalí

quote: If A is a success in life, then A equals x plus y plus z. Work is x; y is play; and z is keeping your mouth shut
author: Milan Kundera, The Unbearable Lightness of Being

quote: It is hard to fail, but it is worse never to have tried to succeed.
author: Leonardo da Vinci

quote: A man is a success if he gets up in the morning and gets to bed at night, and in between he does what he wants to do.
author: Robert F. Kennedy

quote: Kites rise highest against the wind, not with it.
author: Robert Greene, The 48 Laws of Power

quote: In order to succeed, your desire for success should be greater than your fear of failure.
author: Francis Chan, Crazy Love: Overwhelmed by a Relentless God

quote: Success does not consist in never making mistakes but in never making the same one a second time.
author: Niccolò Machiavelli

quote: And will you succeed? Yes indeed, yes indeed! Ninety-eight and three-quarters percent guaranteed!
author: John Wooden

quote: Eighty percent of success is showing up.
author: Neil deGrasse Tyson

quote: If I cannot do great things, I can do small things in a great way
author: Robert Greene, The 48 Laws of Power

quote: People rarely succeed unless they have fun in what they are doing.
author: Junot Díaz, The Brief Wondrous Life of Oscar Wao

quote: Fortune sides with him who dares.
author: Sidney Sheldon, The Other Side of Midnight

quote: Success means we go to sleep at night knowing that our talents and ablities were used in a way that served others.
author: Amelia Earhart

quote: Vision without execution is just hallucination.
author: Georg Wilhelm Friedrich Hegel

quote: Doubt kills more dreams than failure ever will.
author: George S. Patton Jr.

quote: To succeed in the world it is not enough to be stupid - one must also be polite.
author: Alexandre Dumas, The Three Musketeers

quote: Failure should be our teacher, not our undertaker. Failure is delay, not defeat. It is a temporary detour, not a dead end. Failure is something we can avoid only by saying nothing, doing nothing, and being nothing.
author: Mario Andretti

quote: You rarely win, but sometimes you do.
author: Robert Louis Stevenson

quote: I am struck by how sharing our weakness and difficulties is more nourishing to others than sharing our qualities and successes.
author: Will Rogers

quote: Fear can only grow in darkness. Once you face fear with light, you win.
author: Terry Pratchett, Equal Rites

quote: Success is neither magical nor mysterious. Success is the natural consequence of consistently applying basic fundamentals.
author: Po Bronson

quote: What seems to us as bitter trials are often blessings in disguise
author: Steve Maraboli, Life, the Truth, and Being Free

quote: Sometimes success demands a certain refined insanity.
author: Steve Maraboli, Life, the Truth, and Being Free

quote: Success is the doing, not the getting; in the trying, not the triumph. Success is a personal standard, reaching for the highest that is in us, becoming all that we can be. If we do our best, we are a success.
author: Steve Maraboli, Life, the Truth, and Being Free

quote: NEVER be surprised by your own success!
author: Ben Sweetland

quote: Go as far as you can see and you will see further.
author: Steve Maraboli, Life, the Truth, and Being Free

quote: Success is the progressive realization of a worthy ideal
author: Miguel de Cervantes Saavedra

quote: Soar with wit. Conquer with dignity. Handle with care.
author: Myles Munroe, understanding your potential discovering the hidden you

quote: Success is doing what you want to do, when you want, where you want, with whom you want, as much as you want.
author: Steve Maraboli, Life, the Truth, and Being Free

quote: If you really want to eat, keep climbing. The fruits are on the top of the tree. Stretch your hands and keep stretching them. Success is on the top, keep going.
author: John C. Maxwell

quote: It is a common condition of being poor... you are always afraid that the good things in your life are temporary, that someone can take them away, because you have no power beyond your own brute strength to stop them.
author: Steve Maraboli, Life, the Truth, and Being Free

quote: Change is in the air. This change reminds us that we are made and beautifully sculpted by the same power that orchestrates the change of season. Let this be the season you embrace and align yourself with this change.
author: Steve Maraboli, Life, the Truth, and Being Free

quote: For some unknown reason, success usually occurs in private, while failure occurs infull view.
author: Conrad Hilton

quote: Chanel is an institution, and you have to treat an institution like a whore – and then you get something out of her
author: Israelmore Ayivor

quote: Pretend that every single person you meet has a sign around his or her neck that says, "Make me feel important." Not only will you succeed in sales, you will succeed in life.
author: Antonio Machado

quote: We may place blame, give reasons, and even have excuses; but in the end, it is an act of cowardice to not follow your dreams.
author: Mia Hamm

quote: While intent is the seed of manifestation, action is the water that nourishes the seed. Your actions must reflect your goals in order to achieve true success.
author: Steve Maraboli, Life, the Truth, and Being Free

quote: You cannot continue on the same path and arrive at a different destination. Make the choice to have your actions reflect your goals.
author: Steve Maraboli, Life, the Truth, and Being Free

quote: You’ve got to be sure of yourself beforeYou can ever win a prize.
author: Nathan W. Morris

quote: Let today be the day you stop having conflict between your actions and your goals and finally align your greatest intent with your purposeful actions, creating a universal symphony serenading your success!
author: Steve Maraboli, Life, the Truth, and Being Free

quote: Too much action with too little intent makes for wasteful exertion of energy and the confusion between movement and progress.
author: Kanye West

quote: Rise to the challenge of bringing your dreams to life! Do not be discouraged by resistance, be nourished by it. Success is the experience of rising to the level of your true greatness.
author: Napoleon Hill, Think and Grow Rich: The Landmark Bestseller - Now Revised and Updated for the 21st Century

quote: The secret of success in life is for a man to be ready for his opportunity when it comes.
author: Steve Maraboli, Life, the Truth, and Being Free

quote: The difference between Success and failure is not giving up.
author: Joe Strummer

quote: Action is the universal language of success.
author: Adam Savage

quote: Success to me is being happy, truly fulfilled, being proud of myself, and doing different things all the time.
author: Herb True

quote: To burn always with this hard gemlike flame, to maintain this ecstasy, is success in life.
author: Steve Maraboli

quote: Remember how far you’ve come, and you won’t have to rely on a destiny for your future. It will come on your own.
author: Karl Lagerfeld

quote: If at first you don’t succeed, you’re doing it wrong. Learn from the experience. Try again, but with a different approach.
author: Steve Maraboli, Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience

quote: The people we consider successful in our society are all people that seize every moment and make the best of each situation.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche, Beyond Good and Evil

quote: The success of my rule does not rely on my ability to recite obscure Latin verse.
author: Denis Waitley

quote: Stunt dwarf or destroy the imagination of a child and you have taken away its chances of success in life. Imagination transforms the commonplace into the great and creates the new out of the old.
author: Paulo Freire, Pedagogy of the Oppressed

quote: We have forty million reasons for failure, but not a single excuse.
author: Joseph Joubert

quote: Whenever you should doubt your self-worth, remember the lotus flower. Even though it plunges to life from beneath the mud, it does not allow the dirt that surrounds it to affect its growth or beauty.
author: Suzy Kassem, Rise Up and Salute the Sun: The Writings of Suzy Kassem

quote: If there were a master of stupidity in this world, I would really love to listen to his success story.
author: Bryant McGill

quote: You‘ve been given the innate power to shape your life.
author: Nadine Gordimer, Get a Life

quote: To be successful, one has to be one of three bees - the queen bee, the hardest working bee, or the bee that does not fit in.
author: K.L. Toth

quote: It is true that success is the most boring thing, it is tinny and brittle, failure runs deeper. Success is dangerous. I have a very complicated relationship with that word.
author: Steve Maraboli, Life, the Truth, and Being Free

quote: The time has come to harness the blessed power within us and to use it to transcend from our current existence into a more empowered reality.
author: Suzy Kassem, Rise Up and Salute the Sun: The Writings of Suzy Kassem

quote: Once you figure out what you want in life—expect nothing less.
author: Chef Jiro

quote: Once you understand how powerful you are within, you exponentially increase the power and potentiality of everything outside of you.
author: Israelmore Ayivor

quote: He shrugged his shoulders to shift the pain of failure---the pain that is so much greater than the pleasure of success.
author: Lawrence Durrell, Justine

quote: Do the best you can, with what you can, while you can, and success in inevitable.
author: Thomas Merton, The Seven Storey Mountain

quote: Success, for most people, requires unlearning as much as learning.
author: Charles T. Munger

quote: You have had a dream for so many years. Let today be the day you make a plan for it. Just think about how much more likely you are to hit your target when you finally aim at it.
author: Arnold H. Glasow

quote: The key to flow is to pursue an activity for its own sake, not for the rewards it brings.
author: Steve Maraboli

quote: Big things begin with big thinking.
author: Sujit Lalwani, Life Simplified!

quote: When we fail, our pride supports us, and when we succeed it betrays us.
author: Robert W. Service

quote: Do not let your grand ambitions stand in the way of small but meaningful accomplishments.
author: Karl Lagerfeld

quote: Our moral economy went bankrupt long before our financial one.
author: Roger W. Babson

quote: When we give ourselves permission to fail..we at the same time, give ourselves permission to excel.
author: Truman Capote

quote: Life is a web of intersections and choices. Your 1st choice is to recognize an intersection. Your 2nd choice is to be grateful for it.
author: Gloria Steinem, My Life on the Road

quote: Success is not what you have done compared to what others have done. Success is what you have done compared to what you were supposed to do.
author: Orison Swett Marden

quote: Success goes to the ones who do. Get up. Show up. Throw up if you have to. Do it afraid, but do it no matter.
author: Toni Sorenson

quote: The key ingredient to any kind of happiness or success is to never give less than your best
author: Albert Camus

quote: Formal education and current position can define your worthiness. What makes you extraordinary is defined by your attitude towards others.
author: Steve Maraboli, Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience

quote: How would your life be different if...you had a plan of action towards your goals? Let today be the day...You stop allowing your days to be stolen by busy nothingness and take calculated steps towards your goals.
author: Robert Arnot

quote: If life didn’t give you at least one person not wanting you to succeed then half of us would lose are motivation to climb that cliff, in order to prove them wrong.
author: Tim Fargo

quote: Success is realising the true joy and wonder of life can only be yours if you follow your own intuition, aiming to achieve your bliss.
author: Donna McGoff

quote: Doubts in your mind are a much greater roadblock to success than obstacles on the journey.
author: Ashok  Kallarakkal

quote: Nothing succeeds like success.
author: Lionel Suggs

quote: So, I must be taken as I have been made. The success is not mine, the failure is not mine, but the two together make me.
author: Rodolfo Costa, Advice My Parents Gave Me: and Other Lessons I Learned from My Mistakes

quote: My dreams are worthless, my plans are dust, my goals are impossible.All are of no value unless they are followed by action.
author: Steve Backley, The Champion in all of Us: 12 Rules for Success

quote: For some people, their fear to lose is greater than their desire to succeed, so they end up doing nothing and their dreams become impossible.
author: Richard P. Denney

quote: We all have our youthful follies, embarassing to recall -- but people somehow find it hard to dismiss as a youthful folly anything that has happened to be a financial success.
author: Lorii Myers, Make It Happen, A Healthy, Competitive Approach to Achieving Personal Success

quote: A failure establishes only this, that our determination to succeed was not strong enough.
author: Dorothy L. Sayers, Whose Body?

quote: Victory does not come to cowardsit comes to the brave ones.
author: Israelmore Ayivor

quote: Life may bring you to your knees pray. Then GET UP and participate in the answer. BECOME the remedy! BE the solution!
author: Ryan Lilly

quote: Cultivate an optimistic mind, use your imagination, always consider alternatives, and dare to believe that you can make possible what others think is impossible.
author: Og Mandino, The Greatest Salesman in the World

quote: Erase self-doubt by working to build your strengths instead of focusing on your weaknesses.
author: Michelle Sagara West, Cast In Courtlight

quote: Whoever submits himself to a super-discipline can expect great triumphs.
author: Alain de Botton

quote: Athletes who are able to stay completely focused in pursuit of their dreams are the ones that are most likely to become champions.
author: Solange nicole

quote: hard work + smart work = eye caching success, shortcut is not ever
author: William Hazlitt

quote: Dont struggle for salary.. DO struggle for Success..
author: Nelson Bunker Hunt

quote: Becoming well known (at least among your prospects & connections) is the most valuable element in the connection process.
author: Sharad Vivek Sagar

quote: Success is more a function of consistent common sense than it is of genius.
author: Janette Turner Hospital, The Last Magician

quote: The person who makes a success of living is the one who sees his goal steadily and aims for it unswervingly. That is dedication.
author: Shannon Drake, Reckless

quote: Run wild and free like a waterfall
author: Charles F. Glassman, Brain Drain   The Breakthrough That Will Change Your Life

quote: You know you made it, when your friends tell their friends that you are their friend.
author: Michael Bassey Johnson

quote: Take action! An inch of movement will bring you closer to your goals than a mile of intention.
author: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

quote: Not every hen lay eggs. Not every hen that lays eggs gets them hatched. Not everyone born with greatness becomes as such. Go, hatch your eggs.
author: A.C. Benson, Escape and Other Essays

quote: Success is a choice you choose it and work it out! Excellence is deliberate and so it is intentionally pursued. No successful person ever remained idle for success to knock his/her door for him/her
author: Asif Jaana

quote: Listen for the call of your destiny, and when it comes, release your plans and follow.
author: Bernard Kelvin Clive

quote: The greater the loyalty of a group toward the group, the greater is the motivation among the members to achieve the goals of the group, and the greater the probability that the group will achieve its goals.
author: Tommy Newberry, Success is Not an Accident: Change Your Choices Change Your Life

quote: It is never about who is right or wrong, it is about what is best.
author: Julien Smith, The Flinch

quote: You can start to change your luck today. Begin believing that you can have what you desire and superior things will arrive.
author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu

quote: The thrust of continuous action is the firewood which fuels motivation.
author: Robert Freedman

quote: The ladder of success is there waiting for you... you just have to realize it and reach towards and climb as high as you can you will surely be successful.
author: Sukant Ratnakar, Open the Windows

quote: The lesson of Buffett was: To succeed in a spectacular fashion you had to be spectacularly unusual.
author: Arthur Lydiard

quote: Never sit back and wait for a opportunity to find you, get up and search for one, it exists find it!
author: Besa Kosova

quote: Success is messy. But so is life. Deal with it. Poverty is messier.
author: Susan C. Young

quote: No matter how you define success, you will need to be resilient, empowered, authentic, and limber to get there.
author: Israelmore Ayivor, Shaping the dream

quote: Gloating is a superficial glowing, floating is an idle flowing, and bloatedness is the paralysis of blowing up; because silent movement results in loud victories.
author: Israelmore Ayivor, The Great Hand Book of Quotes

quote: Don’t aim at success—the more you aim at it and make it a target, the more you are going to miss it.
author: Confucius, The Analects

quote: As long as we consider failure as an option, success is not going to be the only one choice.
author: Confucius, The Analects

quote: COMPETITOR is one who can steal a few deals, but, the pinch of which, A VISIONARY Never feels...!
author: Sujit Lalwani, Life Simplified!

quote: Success comes to us when we have a burning desire to achieve and we focus our full power on achieving that.
author: Spuds Crawford

quote: Failure has its successes.
author: Robert A. Schuller

quote: Everybody achieves success in life—a blessed few early in their careers, the rest of us when we lower our standards
author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quote: Be as successful as a Smith.
author: Oscar Trejo Jr., Remember Me Tomorrow

quote: Success is not only a goal. It is a journey. When you commit yourself to the journey, the goal is surely there to be attained.
author: Isra

quote: A man who fails well is greater than one who succeeds badly.
author: Mollie Marti

quote: True success is a silence inner process that can empower the mind, heart and soul through strong aspiration for great achievement.
author: Andrew      Brown

quote: A strong man does not succumb to pressures, he knows that without pressures he will not find pleasures and so he will not be made.
author: Eiji Yoshikawa, Musashi

quote: You can actually recreate your world with the Word of the Creator in your mouth.
author: Mike Schmoker, Results

quote: Knowledge is very vital in life`s transformation and transition
author: Scott Edmund Miller

quote: The way to achieve your goals is step by step, you just need to build enough track, to be ahead of the train." ~ John Milton Lawrence
author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quote: I felt sure we could gain the upper hand by putting ourselves in the mindset of the Incas.
author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu, The Prince and the Pauper

quote: your right standing with God and your connection to Him remains your strongest defense in the day of calamity.
author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu, The Prince and the Pauper

quote: There are three types of people in this world. Firstly, there are people who make things happen. Then there are people who watch things happen. Lastly, there are people who ask, what happened? Which do you want to be?
author: Steve Backley, The Champion in all of Us: 12 Rules for Success

quote: If obstacles are large, jump higher.
author: Steve Backley, The Champion in all of Us: 12 Rules for Success

quote: It is action that creates motivation.
author: Steve Backley, The Champion in all of Us: 12 Rules for Success

quote: If you want to continue to be the best in the world, then you have to train and compete like you are second best in the world.
author: Steve Backley, The Champion in all of Us: 12 Rules for Success

quote: Do you want to know what one of the secrets to achieving all of your goals is? You’ve got to be committed.
author: Steve Backley, The Champion in all of Us: 12 Rules for Success

quote: It is one thing to know what should be done, it is another to do it.
author: Steve Backley, The Champion in all of Us: 12 Rules for Success

quote: It is true to say that the secret of a winning formula is the ability to accept that there is a vast area of unexploited potential beyond what you currently perceive to be your maximum.
author: Steve Backley, The Champion in all of Us: 12 Rules for Success

quote: See it, feel it, trust it!
author: Steve Backley, The Champion in all of Us: 12 Rules for Success

quote: If you are able to focus unswervingly on your goals, then all that you desire will become yours.
author: Steve Backley, The Champion in all of Us: 12 Rules for Success

quote: The first step toward success is taken when you refuse to be a captive of the environment in which you first find yourself.
author: Randy Gage

quote: Invest your energy in the things you can control.
author: Steve Backley, The Champion in all of Us: 12 Rules for Success

quote: To think is good. To obsess is bad.
author: Steve Backley, The Champion in all of Us: 12 Rules for Success

quote: They don’t give Olympic medals out for talking a good game.
author: Steve Backley, The Champion in all of Us: 12 Rules for Success

quote: Remember, if you don’t do anything – if you don’t change the way your mind works and direct your subconscious mind to create the life you want – then everything stays the same, nothing changes.
author: Steve Backley, The Champion in all of Us: 12 Rules for Success

quote: The people and successes in your life mirror your beliefs.
author: Steve Backley, The Champion in all of Us: 12 Rules for Success

quote: These are the people who will encourage you to go after your dreams and will inspire you to succeed. Stick to them like a barnacle to a rock.
author: Steve Backley, The Champion in all of Us: 12 Rules for Success

quote: For many, lack of achievement is more a consequence of fear of taking a chance and getting uncomfortable.
author: Jonathan Anthony Burkett, Neglected But Undefeated

quote: The only credential the city asked was the boldness to dream. For those who did, it unlocked its gates and its treasures, not caring who they were or where they came from.
author: George S. Clason, The Richest Man in Babylon

quote: I can only strive for what is important
author: David J. Schwartz

quote: Because I keep it real and reality is a ruthless bitch. Plus I wanna make money – you cool with that?” - Gable
author: Kim Ha Campbell, Inner Peace Outer Abundance

quote: Failure is not an option but it is constantly a possibility. You manage your success by managing both the technical and the social risk.
author: Dr. Dragos, Engineering Success: The True Meaning of Leadership and Team Building

quote: Expressing authentic appreciation doesn’t cost you anything and the outcomes are simply wonderful.
author: Dragos Bratasanu, Ph.D., Engineering Success: The True Meaning of Leadership and Team Building

quote: Social context trumps reason and social context drives your behaviors with an influence akin to an invisible force. We naturally adapt our behaviors to the context.
author: Dragos Bratasanu, Ph.D., Engineering Success: The True Meaning of Leadership and Team Building

quote: There are two kinds of people: goal-oriented and ego-oriented. Goal-oriented people work together and get things gone. Ego-oriented people don’t work.
author: William J. Reilly, How to Avoid Work

quote: A truly successful person is not one who achieves his highest ambitions, but one who enjoys helping others reach theirs.
author: Dragos Bratasanu, Ph.D.

quote: Be sure to ask for help, and vent or brag on your progress along the way.
author: Amber Hurdle, The Bombshell Business Woman: How to Become a Bold, Brave, and Successful Female Entrepreneur

quote: You want to be able to say, for example, “I will know I am successful if these three things happen.
author: Amber Hurdle, The Bombshell Business Woman: How to Become a Bold, Brave, and Successful Female Entrepreneur

quote: If you don’t know your tendencies and can’t analyze when you are most effective, then how can you get the most done in the least amount of time with the best results?
author: Steve Maraboli

quote: It does not matter how many times you fall, the most important thing is there exist grace to shake of the dirt, and pull all forces for a rise up.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: A road often travelled has heavy traffic and you take more time to reach the destination.
author: Richie Norton

quote: Being broke is part of the journey. Staying broke is a fucking choice.
author: Jaymin Shah

quote: When something looks impossible, don’t give up without testing its impossibility
author: Bangambiki Habyarimana, Book of Wisdom

quote: The true meaning of success is not in how many times you failed because of your hindrances, but how you became a success regardless of your hindrances and failures

quote: Success in love is mostly luck, though we hate to admit.

quote: Every great endeavour is fueled by great enthusiasm.

quote: The easy path is seldom the right path.

author: Toni Sorenson

quote: Time utilization and effectiveness is a major marker for success

quote: All great achievements are attained through mighty obstacles.

quote: One, two, three, Im gon be crazy and free.

quote: If you can dream it, you can achieve it.
author: Nick

quote: The ultimate currency is called 'Creativity'.
author: Dexter Yager

quote: There is no greater success as when you turn your enemy into your ally.

quote: The corridors of success are illuminated more by our emotions.

quote: The greatest success is how much impact was made

quote: If I bother to listen, I can navigate by failure just as much as I can navigate by success.

quote: If your life is founded on what you can see then your success will be insignificant and very brief

quote: Morning is a song that succeeds the music of dawn...

quote: So far, we have only seen a glimpse of the human possibilities.

quote: Each day wake up and ask yourself what will make you feel most alive that day.

quote: Let me remind you of what got me this far, picture me quitting, now draw a circle around it and put a line through it, sl#t!

quote: To be a winner in actual you need to be a winner from thoughts first.
author: Deepak Burfiwala, Self-Ignorance Is Your Problem. Self-Awareness Is Your Solution.: Success Is Your Birthright! Life Is Yours and You Are the Pilot of It, Do Something about It.

quote: So what motivates you more? The fear of failure or the fantastic feeling of achieving your dreams?

quote: reading books is great, reading pictures much better, especially those that shows you the future #quote

quote: Belief in God optional. Belief in the self is imperative.

quote: Fear missing an opportunity more than you fear failure.

quote: CHALLENGES MAKE US RISE TO THE OCASSION.

quote: Transformation takes place within us when we learn to be intentional and go from focusing on me to others, success to significance, limited to limitless, and scarcity to abundance.

quote: No one will share your dreams until they come to reality let desire remain effervescent and never despair

quote: Success is the ability to turn a pickle, a bump or an epic failure into an opportunity for success

author: Farshad Asl, The "No Excuses" Mindset: A Life of Purpose, Passion, and Clarity

quote: People blame their failures on past birth, destiny, surroundings, and rarely to self in the order of their evolved mental state. The converse is rather more true for the successful people.

quote: You never know where you can possibly reach in your lifetime if you pursue the path of constant and never ending self-development.
author: Deepak Burfiwala, Self-Ignorance Is Your Problem. Self-Awareness Is Your Solution.: Success Is Your Birthright! Life Is Yours and You Are the Pilot of It, Do Something about It.

quote: A positive Mindset attracts Success like a magnet and a negative one loves to marry failure, procrastination and comfortable environment that sobs in mediocrity and impossibility.

quote: As we go, we become more deeply committed to a life of purpose and meaning and personal decency as we come to feel a broader connection to the shared experience of humanity.

quote: Surrender is not an option, keep trying is the answer.
author: Auliq-Ice

quote: Hard world is a prison sentence only if it does not have meaning.

quote: There is no such thing as a weakness, only blindspots. No such thing as failure, they are just detours and scenic routes to remember your success

quote: Success is less about what you get at the end but more about who you become in the journey.
author: Deepak Burfiwala, Self-Ignorance Is Your Problem. Self-Awareness Is Your Solution.: Success Is Your Birthright! Life Is Yours and You Are the Pilot of It, Do Something about It.

quote: Your targets empower you as they allow yourself to bring out the best within you.
author: Deepak Burfiwala, Self-Ignorance Is Your Problem. Self-Awareness Is Your Solution.: Success Is Your Birthright! Life Is Yours and You Are the Pilot of It, Do Something about It.

quote: You see it as me going back. I see it as me staying on track.

quote: May success chase and find you as you work hard.

quote: The most successful people I know are also the most reliable.

quote: Never mind the mistakes. One day they will become your most prized possessions.

quote: The triangle of success for an Entrepreneur is not only composed of his Net Worth, but also his Self Worth, and Net Works.

quote: In success, knowledge - In failure, lessons.

quote: You can be good at many things, but you can only be great at one thing, until you find that thing, you are an average loser.

quote: Never focus your attention on what the world has to say about you. Rather turn your focus inside and listen to what your inner voice has to say to you.

quote: Manifesting your dreams into reality becomes easier when your passionate commitment engages your laser focus on success

quote: Greatness can be contagious, but first there must be contact.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Don’t just GO through life, GROW through it. For Life comes to you only once, never to return! Climb the Ladder of Life, step by step.-RVM
author: INTERNET

quote: Lewis created a new kind of marriage between theological reflection and poetic imagination.
author: Zamreen Zarook

quote: Stories are "how we organize the chaos of experience into the order we require just a carry-on." Joan Gideon
author: Rick Perlstein, The Invisible Bridge: The Fall of Nixon and the Rise of Reagan

quote: God Almighty is my sacred shelter.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

quote: Write your sacred story.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

quote: We are inspiration to one another
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

quote: You must be present in the present to make it a present. -RVM
author: RVM

quote: Life ahead is full of endless opportunities.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

quote: Boldly walk on own path. You will find your treasure.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

quote: I just got my blood running with so much love.
author: Colleen Hoover, Maybe Someday

quote: Thy eyes hold countless stars yet to be discovered.
author: Avijeet Das

quote: Focus on the future and the outcomes you want, not your present setbacks or failures.
author: Mensah Oteh

quote: You can change your perspective on any experience by given it a positive and empowering meaning.
author: Mensah Oteh

quote: It’s not what happens, it’s what you do that makes the difference to how things turn out. Change your perspective in the way that serves you best.
author: Avijeet Das

quote: Focus means exercising the self-discipline required to keep your time, energy and attention directed towards the outcomes you have chosen whilst avoiding all distractions – good or bad.
author: Mensah Oteh

quote: There are many good things in the world, but not all of them benefit you. Focus keeps you on the path of what is right and away from other options.
author: Mensah Oteh

quote: If you can stay focused on your most important goal, you can become incredibly successful, but to stay focused you must intentionally create and maintain an environment, atmosphere, and culture that keeps you focused.
author: Mensah Oteh

quote: You will fall short of achieving your goals if your focus is fragmented and your attention, energy, and concentration diversified.
author: Mensah Oteh, The Good Life: Transform your life through one good day

quote: Focus is where you fail or succeed.
author: Mensah Oteh, The Good Life: Transform your life through one good day

quote: You should be your best critic and coach.
author: Avijeet Das

quote: Your thoughts create your reality and you can chose the quality and the type of reality you experience every day by guarding your mind and only allowing the right input.
author: Mensah Oteh

quote: Time is life. To manage time you simply have to manage yourself.
author: Mensah Oteh, The Best Chance: A Guide to Discovering Your Purpose, Reaching Your Potential, Experiencing Fulfilment and Achieving Success in Any Area of Life

quote: If you don’t understand the concept of time or appreciate its value, it’s almost impossible to be successful.
author: Mensah Oteh, Wisdom Keys In Words: A collection of the Inspirational words that will change your life

quote: When your focus is too narrow you can miss the big picture.
author: Mensah Oteh

quote: Your perspective changes relative to the frame through which you see things.
author: Mensah Oteh

quote: Circumstances, events or situations have no power except that which you give them.
author: Mensah Oteh

quote: Invest in yourself, because you will only ever achieve the level of success that matches your level of wisdom.
author: Mensah Oteh, The Best Chance: A Guide to Discovering Your Purpose, Reaching Your Potential, Experiencing Fulfilment and Achieving Success in Any Area of Life

quote: Wisdom is made complete with knowledge, understanding and good judgement.
author: Mensah Oteh

quote: Buy wisdom no matter the price.
author: Mensah Oteh

quote: For long-term success, invest 5-10% of your time each day and 5-10% of your income each month in increasing your wisdom.
author: Mensah Oteh

quote: Invest in books that will help you become the person you were born to be and do what you should do.
author: Mensah Oteh

quote: To gain wisdom you must be willing to invest time, energy, and money in your personal development.
author: Mensah Oteh, The Good Life: Transform your life through one good day

quote: Change in thinking + shift in perspective = change in your life
author: Mensah Oteh

quote: Make the tough choice
author: Mensah Oteh

quote: Renew your mind by flooding it with inspiring, empowering, educational and edifying thoughts and words.
author: Mensah Oteh

quote: Your external world is a mirror of your internal world, and if you can discipline yourself to change your thoughts, your external world will change.
author: Mensah Oteh

quote: Indecision is a decision not to use life’s first gift to you – the power of choice.
author: Mensah Oteh

quote: Time doesn’t create change. The changes in your life will be in proportion to the decisions you make.
author: you must become aware of what needs to change to effectively make a change.

quote: Give yourself permission to dream, to choose, to decide.
author: Mensah Oteh

quote: Most of us make decisions without thinking about their impact on our future.
author: Mensah Oteh, The Best Chance: A Guide to Discovering Your Purpose, Reaching Your Potential, Experiencing Fulfilment and Achieving Success in Any Area of Life

quote: Decisions create success, and the quality of your decisions will determine the quality of your life.
author: Mensah Oteh

quote: Your wisdom decides the quality of your decisions.
author: Mensah Oteh

quote: One thing guaranteed in life is that you’ll experience twists and turns, obstacles, roadblocks, and battles.
author: Mensah Oteh

quote: All battles are not created equal; a few offer good rewards and are worthy of your attention but most are a waste of your time, energy and focus.
author: Mensah Oteh

quote: The reward for all battles should always be greater than the sacrifice you have to make.
author: Mensah Oteh

quote: Be unconventional when you face a battle. Change the rules of engagement to your benefit.
author: Mensah Oteh, The Good Life: Transform your life through one good day

quote: Planning is deciding your destination and setting your sail so you achieve the outcomes and arrive at your intended destination in the shortest possible time.
author: Mensah Oteh

quote: Never start a day or activity without a plan. Learn to plan your work, and then work your plan.
author: Mensah Oteh

quote: Ask empowering questions daily so your mind can focus on new possibilities and solutions instead of problems.
author: Mensah Oteh

quote: The answers to all problems or issues is hidden in a question.
author: Mensah Oteh

quote: Those who succeed in life are those who are unashamed to ask silly questions.
author: Mensah Oteh

quote: Take the time every day to teach and train yourself how to ask empowering questions. Those who ask the right questions change the world.
author: Anurag Shourie, You Are Mine: Romantic Voices of Romantic Hearts

quote: Like the rudder or anchor on a ship, your habits can guide you in the direction of your dreams or hold you back and keep you from achieving them.
author: Mensah Oteh

quote: What you do daily decides your destiny and (more importantly) your legacy.
author: Mensah Oteh

quote: Habits decide who you become permanently, what you do daily and what you have always.
author: Mensah Oteh

quote: Sometimes it’s best to stop searching for your passion. Instead, follow your curiosity and see where it leads.
author: Mensah Oteh

quote: Be passionate about creating a life that is exciting and fun, one that will help you reach your ultimate potential.
author: Mensah Oteh

quote: Passion is simply energy, and we all have energy within us which implies you already have all the passion you need within you.
author: Mensah Oteh, The Best Chance: A Guide to Discovering Your Purpose, Reaching Your Potential, Experiencing Fulfilment and Achieving Success in Any Area of Life

quote: The most important thing you can do for yourself each day is to create (in and around you) an environment that keeps you constantly inspired because when you’re inspired, there is absolutely nothing you cannot do.
author: Mensah Oteh, The Good Life: Transform your life through one good day

quote: Your dreams are the golden gate to a life of inspiration. The more you allow yourself to dream of your ideal future, the stronger your inspiration.
author: Mensah Oteh

quote: Inspiration is a lifestyle that must be practised continuously and is one that is never completely mastered.
author: Mensah Oteh

quote: Study yourself and develop your personal inspiration routine, applying it to your life every day to help you create the extraordinary life you deserve.
author: Mensah Oteh

quote: Success starts with a good plan. To have it, you have to plan it.
author: Mensah Oteh

quote: Without a good plan, you might fall short of reaching your dreams and goals.
author: Mensah Oteh

quote: Planning eliminates urgency by allowing you to bring your future into the present.
author: Mensah Oteh

quote: You already have great gifts, talents and abilities, but you must find the environment where your potential can be developed and maximised
author: Mensah Oteh

quote: You were born for a purpose and a special reason.Your purpose identifies your passion, your potential, the source of your fulfilment in life, and ultimately your success
author: Mensah Oteh

quote: It is not what you know that determines the quality of your life
author: Mensah Oteh

quote: Success should not only be measured by what you get but by the stewardship of your duty.
author: Mensah Oteh

quote: The greatest of tragedies is a life lived without knowing its purpose. Discover your purpose and life will take on a new meaning.
author: Mensah Oteh

quote: The best way to truly live a consistent life of passion is to formulate daily habits and a daily routine that engages you and makes you feel more passionate about life
author: Mensah Oteh

quote: Passion is the feeling of excitement, energy and enthusiasm you feel towards something or someone you care about.
author: Mensah Oteh

quote: Passion ignites your innate desire to create, produce, give and grow.
author: we all have it within us. It simply needs a means of expression.

quote: Our lives are defined by how we spend our time and what we choose to do daily. A life of passion is not an act but a lifestyle.
author: Avijeet Das

quote: Until you can see it in your mind, you will not see it with your eyes. Vision precedes sight.
author: Mensah Oteh

quote: Whatever happens in your life, make a promise to yourself that you will never give up your ability to dream.
author: Mensah Oteh, The Best Chance: A Guide to Discovering Your Purpose, Reaching Your Potential, Experiencing Fulfilment and Achieving Success in Any Area of Life

quote: Stay inspired by feeding your mind with positive, healthy, mental food through reading or listening to good inspirational, motivational, and educational material.
author: Mensah Oteh

quote: The world belongs to dreamers.
author: Mensah Oteh

quote: You made a poet fall in love with the world.
author: Sachin sawariya

quote: Your true potential is unlimited, and you can certainly achieve much more than human intelligence can comprehend.
author: Mensah Oteh

quote: There is an angel within you waiting to be released.
author: Mensah Oteh

quote: Your potential has no boundaries
author: Shayne Silvers, Obsidian Son

quote: Tickle my heart with your pen. Write me for all to read. Bind our love inside a book. Make me your poetry.
author: Karen A. Baquiran

quote: Dream like a child with complete faith and no limits. This is the only way the greatness within you can be awakened.
author: Mensah Oteh

quote: Dreams and visions are important not only because of the energy and passion they generate but also because of their ability to create hope.
author: Mensah Oteh

quote: Start every day by making a list of all the experiences you will fill your day with and make an effort to achieve them.
author: Mensah Oteh

quote: Words are life. They can tear down or build up, so use them wisely.
author: Mensah Oteh

quote: Your past success and victories, small or large, can renew your resolve to persevere if you are willing to lean on them.
author: Mensah Oteh

quote: Start every day by making a list of all the experiences you will fill your day with and make an effort.
author: Mensah Oteh

quote: When you find a way to serve, the angel in you awakens.
author: Mensah Oteh

quote: Each daily improvement should have a means by which it can be measured so you can see and feel yourself growing
author: Mensah Oteh

quote: That girl who doesn’t even understand my language properly, understands my heart, but the one who should, doesn’t even try
author: Mensah Oteh

quote: All love is immortal.
author: Mensah Oteh

quote: The success equation is complete only when achievement, fulfilment and lifestyle are present.
author: Mensah Oteh

quote: If you want to succeed, make it a study first then practice it and finally live it daily.
author: Mensah Oteh

quote: We are all actors in life. Some act like they won’t amount to much while others do the opposite. You have a choice
author: Mensah Oteh

quote: You don’t have to be a miracle worker to make things happen – you just have to be a believer and a doer.
author: Mensah Oteh

quote: Success is evident from the joy you experience. Be willing to let go of anything that takes your joy away.
author: Mensah Oteh

quote: Success is a result not an action.
author: Mensah Oteh

quote: Like any formula, success has parts and therefore it is expressed in three ways – achievement (a science), fulfilment (an art) and lifestyle (an act). All three have to be present for the formula to be complete.
author: Mensah Oteh

quote: Don’t let your circumstances and the events in your life rob you of the joy of celebration.
author: Mensah Oteh

quote: Don’t wait for others to celebrate you, learn to do it yourself.
author: Mensah Oteh

author: Mensah Oteh

quote: Gratitude isn’t innate. It’s a habit that has to be learned through practice.
author: Mensah Oteh

quote: Those who live in gratitude start their day by setting their intentions and the direction they want to move in each day.
author: Mensah Oteh

quote: We all have to be taught how to be thankful and once learned, it has to be improved and practised daily.
author: Mensah Oteh

quote: Gratitude must come from a place of true sincerity to be effective. Without sincerity, the experience is incomplete.
author: Mensah Oteh

quote: Gratitude is arriving at the point where your expectations, accumulation and anticipations make way for appreciation, reflection and celebration.
author: Mensah Oteh

quote: It’s no mystery, it isn’t luck. Success is a result of your obedience to specific principles, rules and laws
author: Mensah Oteh

quote: Appreciation generates energy, like thankfulness creates increase.
author: it is a feeling directed towards the giver.

quote: If you got on your knees and counted all of the blessings, goodness, grace, favour and kindness in your life, you would find that you would exhaust the whole day and will still have more to share.
author: Mensah Oteh

quote: Master the art of finding something to celebrate about in each moment and life will become an exciting adventure.
author: Mensah Oteh

quote: Your life is lived in a day, so focus on living one good day by successfully designing, creating and living that good day and duplicating it.
author: Mensah Oteh

quote: Life never gives you what you want or need just because you have a burning desire for it. Life gives you what you seek, knock, and ask for.
author: Mensah Oteh

quote: See each day as an investment in the future and be willing to do today what you wish to experience in the future.
author: the season of sacrifice will have to be endured first before the promise is due.

quote: The abundant life doesn’t happen by accident. It is the result of doing specific things purposefully every day and it requires an investment of time, energy and effort.
author: Mensah Oteh

quote: To succeed in life you need five things – a burning desire, a willingness to do whatever it takes, wisdom, incredible effort, and a commitment to never-ending improvement.
author: Mensah Oteh

quote: Abundance is living the life you were born to experience.
author: Mensah Oteh

quote: Don’t live so casually that you fail to see how blessed you are.
author: Mensah Oteh

quote: Gratitude is the key to wealth and abundance, so learn to be grateful in all things.
author: Mensah Oteh

quote: You are perfect, not tomorrow, not in the future, but today.
author: Mensah Oteh

quote: Stop trying to understand people. Love them instead.
author: Mensah Oteh

quote: Get rid of the judgmental mindset and adopt one of love and acceptance towards people – including yourself.
author: Mensah Oteh

quote: Life has a sense of humour
author: Mensah Oteh

quote: Anyone who constantly makes you unhappy belongs in someone else’s world, not yours.
author: Mensah Oteh

quote: Find something about yourself to laugh about every day
author: Mensah Oteh

quote: You can’t afford to leave your happiness to others. Create what you wish to experience.
author: Mensah Oteh

quote: Humour, like any life skill, is learnable. If others can learn it, so can you.
author: Mensah Oteh

quote: Happiness is the decision to find something good in every situation.
author: Mensah Oteh

quote: When two souls are one, they hear each other, even in silence.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: The relentless desire to give is evidence of love.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: And you will keep breaking my heart a thousand times. And I will keep joining the pieces back a thousand times.
author: Altaf ul qadri

quote: Everything-less. The lack of everything. Synonym to nothing. I am everything-less without you.
author: Anurag Shourie, Half A Shadow

quote: To achieve peace let go of: guilt, anger, and bitterness. To achieve happiness embrace: virtue, faith, and love.
author: John M Sheehan

quote: When a man meets the right woman, he meets a new strength!
author: Lorri Faye

quote: I taught her to fly, and she began to soar.
author: Shellie Palmer

quote: Love began everything.Nothing ends till it ends in Love.Once it ends in Love,it is not an end but Beginning of Love.
author: Ashok Khurana

quote: Opportunities seldom appear wrapped in shiny paper with a big bow as you might hope. Remaining open to the packages they do in fact come in, regardless of how they appear, can lead to hugely profound experiences.
author: Sami Abouzid

quote: I believe in the brotherhood of mankind.
author: Swaran Jaggi

quote: You send a girl to school in order to make friends - the right sort.
author: Jennifer Chiaverini, The Wedding Quilt

quote: 2. Overcommitment and time pressure are the greatest destroyers of marriages. It takes time to develop any friendship...whether with a loved one or with God Himself.
author: Israelmore Ayivor, Become a Better You

quote: Children and rain, both are intimate friends.
author: Kcat Yarza, KCAT CAN: I have a pen that writes

quote: My heart and my soul are best of friends.And their friendship startedthe day you and I first met.
author: Hanya Yanagihara, A Little Life

quote: Slavery of the soul is worst than the slavery of the flesh.....
author: Patience Johnson, Why Does an Orderly God Allow Disorder

quote: If God permit you to fall, He will definitely stand by you to rise.
author: Patience Johnson, Why Does an Orderly God Allow Disorder

quote: The devil is a professional in destroying lives, but the problem is that people themselves allow him to destroy their lives
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: I have a definite psychosis in being with people. I cannot bear it very long.
author: Jordan Hoechlin

quote: Two forces create eternity – a fairy tale and a dream from the fairy tale.
author: Corey Ann Haydu, OCD Love Story

quote: Into the day as by dream I swim To the music of nourished meaning.
author: Iain Banks

quote: Felix had gone to live in a lotus land of his imagination. Where what is desired is dreamed of as already happened, where obstacles dissolve under the weight of desire, and where reality has vanished entirely.
author: Patrick McCabe, The Dead School

quote: Even the brightest of dreams-come-true had shadowy recesses.
author: Daphne du Maurier, Rebecca

quote: from under the ground, from under the waters,they clutch at us, they clutch at us,we won’t let go.
author: Stephen King, The Stand

quote: If life is a dream, better you dread the waking!
author: William Least Heat-Moon, Blue Highways

quote: It is a dangerous thing to bring a dream to life....I have watched my deepest, dearest hopes take shape, and I am not entirely sure I like the shape they have taken.
author: Darnell Lamont Walker

quote: Dreams are debris from bad day. Dreams are poems by bad poets that never got written.
author: Stewart Stafford, The Vorbing

quote: It is better to experience temporary discomfort to achieve the dream, than permanent comfort without any fulfillment.
author: Shannon L. Alder

quote: One of the most human things that you can do is reach out for the stars knowing that you might not ever touch them; we are all perfectly imperfect, but to live knowing so is to be a fulfilled human being.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: It was a curious day, slashed abruptly with fleeting, familiar impressions.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Confidently chase your dreams.
author: F. Scott Fitzgerald

quote: Be determined to fulfill your dreams.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: The greatest feeling is the fulfillment of dreams.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: The only limit to what you can achieve is the limit you set for yourself.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Are you willing to pay the price for the fulfilment of your passion?
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: The greatest dreams are always considered unrealistic to those with no ambition
author: Theodore Volgoff, The Pool

quote: If you believe you can achieve your dreams, you find the strength to pursue it.
author: Virgil Kalyana Mittata Iordache

quote: The best dreams are the dreams we made come true for the world.
author: Sigmund Freud, The Interpretation of Dreams

quote: The answer of life struggles in between two kinds of people- those who live to dreamand those who dream to liveAsk them the question about death if they can truly conceive
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: As we work together as a team, God grows our dreams into something greater than we can accomplish alone.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Be careful of what you dream and expect in life. You might just get it.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: You are sitting! Want to be there? You can’t reach there by not going there! Sitting is the enemy of your dreams!
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: I FELT HAPPINESS LIKE A BLIND,TILL I HAD A SATISFIED MIND.SORROW FOR WHAT I LOST,IS LIKE DREAMS THAT COST.
author: Bernard DeVoto, The Year of Decision 1846

quote: Never under-estimate your effort, no matter how little. Every effort, little or great is a step closer towards the actualisation of your dreams.
author: Manoj Arora, Dream On: Every setback is a little nudge from HIM to Dream On

quote: May you find a new strength to reach out for dreams.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

quote: The greatest energy must be use for work.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

quote: Abiding in the vine leads to fruit bearing.
author: Simon S. Tam

quote: The scarlet letter was her passport into regions where other women dared not tread.
author: Cristina Henriquez, The Book of Unknown Americans

quote: Men promise freedom while establishing laws
author: G. Willow Wilson, Alif the Unseen

quote: Regulations in an "Idea Economy" are restraints on innovation.
author: Bert McCoy

quote: And now I see the face of god, and I raise this god over the earth, this god whom men have sought since men came into being, this god who will grant them joy and peace and pride. This god, this one word: "I.
author: James Truslow Adams

quote: We the living are to blame for the painfulness of being dead.
author: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

quote: We make our own luck. I believed that, too. We chose our own fate. We controlled our own future. I knew what I wanted. I needed to go get it.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: I try to avoid stories that end with...and he was never seen again.
author: Swati Kumar, The Great Indian Dilemma

quote: The distance between two minds is understanding.
author: Rupi Kaur, Milk and Honey

quote: Everything is created twice. Once in your mind, then in your life!
author: Avijeet Das

quote: a question is embarrassing for a moment, but not asking is embarrassing for a lifetime
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: Every day we have a choice - either to spread love and peace or to spread hate and war! And each one of us must choose love and peace each time and every time!
author: Andrija Jonić

quote: You were born to shine
author: John Maiorana (Giovanni)

quote: Leave beauty marks in the lives of those you meet, not scars.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: Think outside of the box. Work outside of the box. Dream outside of the box. Succeed outside of the box.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: Your feet may be small, but travel much. Your hands may be little, but conquer much. Your eyes may be tiny, but perceive much. Your ears may be modest, but heed much.
author: Boniface Sagini, Thrills and Chills: Trudging Through Life

quote: I think everything good and right in this world should be put on vinyl.
author: Saad Khan

quote: Two minds are smarter than one.Two hands are stronger than one.Two hearts are mightier than one.Two souls are greater than one.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: The unkind words that we said and the unkind deeds that we did will haunt us one day!
author: Avijeet Das

quote: A Maximus, the Gladiator lies in every human being. When the time comes, your Maximus within you will come out. It is not called destiny, it is an extended automatic self reflex
author: Alin Sav

quote: You are no greater than the friends you keep, the books you read, the heroes you admire, and the obstacles you overcome.
author: Paulo Coelho, The Alchemist

quote: Turn your failures into lessons, your obstacles into opportunities, your tragedies into triumphs, and in no time you will turn your dreams into reality.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: Life is a hologram. Even the smallest moment contains eternity within it.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: Other people influence your life through their actions and thoughts.
author: Steven Redhead, Life Is A Cocktail

quote: The past always wishes to play its part in the unfolding drama of life.
author: Steven Redhead, Life Is A Cocktail

quote: Selfishness is the absence of selflessness
author: Thabiso Monkoe, The Azanian

quote: Practicing what you preach is the world’s most eloquent sermon.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: Time is your acquaintance. Life is your friend. Death is your opponent. Eternity is your companion.
author: J. Limbu

quote: You may be poor, but important; uneducated, but wise; lowly, but noble; simple, but insightful; and ordinary, but great.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: An ounce of wisdom is worth more than a pound of knowledge.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: Life is not meant to follow a pattern. Every moment has a multitude of realms.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: Learn more than others. Work more than others. Succeed more than others. Give more than others.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: Know what you want. Pursue what you need. Realize what you ought. Attain what you desire.
author: Avijeet Das

quote: Worry makes you weaker, regret makes you sadder, hate makes you angrier, but hope makes you stronger, and love makes you happier.
author: that is why they are always picked first.

quote: Be positive. Believe that you will succeed. See it, go for it. No matter what the odds, most of the battle is inside your own head. -- Bob Mayer
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: Be yourself, DO NOT ACT.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: There is no such thing as a neutral relationship. All your relationships affect you – some pull you down and others lift you up.
author: Mensah Oteh

quote: Diamonds are valuable because they are uncommon
author: litymunshi

quote: If you want little, give little; if you want much, give much; if you want all, give all.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: No one can steal your happiness unless you give them the key to your heart’s safe.
author: Izey Victoria Odiase

quote: Life is beautiful.. Enjoy the life when it is beautiful only...
author: boddu subbarao

quote: Not every Gym Rat will become MVP, but every MVP is a gym rat.
author: Bhavik Sarkhedi, The Weak Point Dealer

quote: An archer must never blame a target for missing it.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: Enjoy the Life.. until the Energy is in your Life...
author: boddu subabrao

quote: Rest as if you’ll live forever
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: Faith moves mountains, intelligence goes over them, wisdom goes around them, but love levels them.
author: Richelle E. Goodrich, Slaying Dragons

quote: Time crawls when you are bored
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: If you have power, be just; wealth, be generous; knowledge, be wise; titles, be humble; and life, be grateful.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: Life is a process of discovering your INNATE NATURE!
author: Atalina Wright, Unbound

quote: Opportunities, like roses, come with a beautiful fragrance, but also with thorns.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: Don’t climb a mountain to look down on people below, but to get a clearer view of the stars above.
