author: Christopher Babson, Breakout Presentations: Wow! People in Business and Life

quote: There are often two sets of goals in life: those that we establish, and those that really matter.
author: Janna Cachola

quote: If our lives are pleasing to Allah, and our goals are things which He approves then we can expect His Divine Assistance in accomplishing them, which includes Barakah in our time.
author: Craig D. Lounsbrough

quote: Project a confident image through good body posture.
author: Cindy Ann Peterson, My Style, My Way: Top Experts Reveal How to Create Yours Today

quote: A core group of guys, all sharing similar goals, can move mountains.
author: Chris Matakas, The Tao of Jiu Jitsu

quote: Your posture can have a great deal of influence on your personal presentation and image, revealing your attitude toward yourself and others.
author: Cindy Ann Peterson, My Style, My Way: Top Experts Reveal How to Create Yours Today

quote: I was the director of my life, it was already true, and I would soon lead myself to my dreamed-of destinations.It was the task of my one thousand miles of solitude.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: When will you open your eyes to the possibility of the world?
author: Richelle E. Goodrich, Making Wishes

quote: Knowledge only becomes wisdom, when it is utilized and produces fruit that makes it possibleto reach the goals that God has set.
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: Don’t think about what can happen in a month. Don’t think about what can happen in a year. Just focus on the 24 hours in front of you and do what you can to get closer to where you want to be.
author: Fyodor Dostoyevsky, Notes from Underground, White Nights, The Dream of a Ridiculous Man, and Selections from The House of the Dead

quote: Stop looking for a partner. Focus on your goals and rebuilding your life. The right person will eventually find their way to you.
author: Tsunetomo Yamamoto

quote: You will find there are times you must grasp your life with both hands and forcefully steer it in a new direction and then strain to hold your course until the storms of fear, weakness, and doubt abate.
author: Shannon L. Alder

quote: A goal is not just an object on a pitch
author: Rob Liano

quote: Always do your best in whatever you do
author: Charlotte Eriksson

quote: A goal that is not written is not a goal. It only becomes real when you write it down.
author: Gary Belsky, Why Smart People Make Big Money Mistakes and How to Correct Them: Lessons from the Life-Changing Science of Behavioral Economics

quote: If you can see the vision of your goal clearly, you can plan and map effectively, and navigate efficiently.
author: aim to surpass them!

quote: The denial of assistance is sometimes the greatest assistance. The trick is recognizing when this is the case.
author: Windston Churchill

quote: Went to bed with a dream.Woke up with a purpose.
author: Sereda Aleta Dailey, The Magnificent Weight Loss System

quote: Imagine what your life would be like if you were completely uninhibited by fear, pride, or procrastination. What would you be capable of? Anything.
author: Richelle E. Goodrich, Smile Anyway

quote: It has never been my goal to impress anyone but myself. That has proven challenging enough.
author: Richard G. Scott

quote: To accelerate success, we must get as close to our dreams as possible as soon as possible.
author: Rob Liano

quote: You can’t reach the destination which you don’t know. So what’s the use of hard work when you don’t know where it’s taking you?
author: Dinesh Kumar, Destiny Re scripted

quote: Stop throwing away days, weeks, months, and years by simply day-dreaming about what you wish your life would be.
author: Nido Qubein

quote: The fulfillment of your dreams lies within you and you alone.When you understand and accept this then nothing, or no one can deny you greatness.
author: Ellen J. Barrier

quote: To set goals and pursue them, we must have a desire to dream of things some would think to be impossible.
author: Ellen J. Barrier

quote: If you have goals and procrastination, you have nothing. If you have goals and you take action, you will have anything you want.
author: Derek Sivers

quote: Sometimes in this life, only one or two opportunities are put before us and we must seize them no matter the risk.
author: Lorii Myers, No Excuses, The Fit Mind-Fit Body Strategy Book

quote: You are successful when you accomplish the goals and dreams you set for yourself.
author: Steve Maraboli, Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience

quote: Dare to believe that good things are possible when you follow your heart.
author: Steve Maraboli, Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience

quote: A sense of accomplishment comes when you have completed the tasks for the goals you have set for yourself.
author: Steve Maraboli, Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience

quote: My mother once told me, when you have to make a decision, imagine the person you want to become someday. Ask yourself, what would that person do?
author: Stephen Richards

quote: There is nothing more satisfying than having plans.
author: Charles Darwin, Voyage of the Beagle

quote: TAKE ACTION! Wanting is not enough; Act upon your goals! If somebody was watching your day-to-day behavior, would they be able to see what you’re working towards; what your goals are? If the answer is no, FIX IT!
author: Anna   Stevens, Turn Your Dreams And Wants Into Achievable SMART Goals!

quote: All the answers to your questions about what your goals can and should be lie within, so does your power to accomplish those goals.
author: JohnA Passaro, In the Zone and Other Sports Essays

quote: Make the goal huge and you cannot miss!
author: Steve Maraboli, Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience

quote: You have a right to feel the universe is willing to provide you with blessings, but not to the point that it cannot do without you.
author: Stephen Richards

quote: Do not avoid doing what you love because you fear that it will only result in poverty or lack. If you fear this, then this is exactly what will happen.
author: Stephen Richards

quote: Do not constantly question why your desires have not manifested, although you should keep a vibrational connection to them.
author: Stephen Richards

quote: Do not ask, "Is is possible?" rather, "Is is worth what it will require of me to make it happen?
author: Martin Gover, The Simplest Book Ever on Life Attitude and Happiness

quote: People do not wander around and then find themselves at the top of Mount Everest.
author: Rasheed Ogunlaru

quote: The funny thing about an impossibility is that it tends to be a magnet for those who would prove it otherwise.
author: Steve Maraboli, Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience

quote: A tenacious grip on our own ideals, irrespective of hurdles, would propel us towards self-actualization!
author: Rachael Bermingham

quote: Self care, self love.Self esteem, self confidence
author: Toni Sorenson

quote: You want to be loved? Love yourself first and passionately. Forgive yourself readily. Care for every part of you. Only when you love yourself do you have love to give to others.
author: John Banville, The Untouchable

quote: Be grateful for every scar life inflicts on you. Where we’re unhurt is where we are false. Where we are wounded and healed is where our real self gets to show itself. That’s where you get to show who you really are
author: René Descartes, Meditations on First Philosophy

quote: There is no shame in having been the woman I was. She made me the woman I am.
author: Donald c.Nwokedi

quote: Write as if life has no meanings without writing.
author: Jean-Paul Sartre, Existentialism Is a Humanism

quote: ​Let your pretence of arrogance grow big as a Dinosaur, so that the fake intellectuals start to realize their true inferiority in front of you.
author: Kenneth Wayne Wood

quote: Is there a price too great to pay for your own happiness? What is the price that you are willing to pay for your own happiness?
author: Karen Salmansohn

quote: Her two outstanding characteristics were self-confidence and candor. The latter sometimes got her into hot water Durrance later told Charlotte, but the former kept it from scalding her.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Where there is life, there is a hope.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: All of the years I spent trying to be someone you could be proud of would have been better spent being proud of myself for who I already was.
author: Shannon Tanner, Worthy: The POWER of Wholeness

quote: Modesty isn’t always a virtue
author: Unarine Ramaru

quote: The subconscious mind is aware of the many worlds unfolding in each moment.
author: J.D. Robb

quote: When we stop looking for someone to complete us... We find completion in ourselves.
author: Bernard Kelvin Clive

quote: If you want to improve your self-worth, stop giving other people the calculator.
author: Michael Bassey Johnson

quote: The price you will offer yourself to the world, is how much they will buy you.
author: Justin Young

quote: One day, everything will be like before again. And it is not like it.
author: Doha Asrir

quote: Also the air: the air is full of sighs and cries. These are never lost: if you listen carefully, with a sympathetic ear, you can hear them echoing forever within the second sphere.
Dont look back , there is a darkness of your past
author: Raymond Chandler, The Big Sleep

quote: At least if you were ignorant, you could do what you wanted, you had no idea what had been achieved in the past. You were free, instead of chewed at by bleeding impotence, dissolved away like a pearl in acid.
author: Sean Sullivan

quote: There are only two kinds of people in this world, Mr. Sallinger: people who rise above that suffering and people who let it define them." (The Ables)
author: George R.R. Martin, A Clash of Kings

quote: If you really want to talk to the big boss now, make sure you leave your balls here with me, for he likes no balls on people he is talking to.
author: Shannon L. Alder

quote: I should pursue only those habits that would make me feel freer and stronger.
author: Prajakta Mhadnak

quote: I do a weird thing when I am nervous where I tilt my head back like I am super confident. This is my attempt to fake it until I make it, or at the very least make it easier for someone to slit my throat.
author: Barry Hannah, Airships

quote: That word, confidence, was like butter on a hot stove for Darien, what he considered the most attractive quality in a woman.
author: Danielle  Paige, The Wicked Will Rise

quote: The best thing you can wear is self confidence.
author: keep making them until you are confident in what you see.

quote: Our confidence needs to come from within, not without. From the quality of our hearts, not the quantity of things we own. After all, he who dies with the most toys...still dies.
author: Unarine Ramaru

quote: By taking good care of your posture now, you will enjoy and savor lifelong health benefits and beauty.
author: Cindy Ann Peterson, My Style, My Way: Top Experts Reveal How to Create Yours Today

quote: Confidence is being able to say ‘Fuck you, I’m the shit’ without opening your mouth, say it with your walk, with your smile, say it with your entire being.
author: Zadie Smith, Changing My Mind: Occasional Essays

quote: Subtlety is the mark of confidence and is thus by far the hardest thing for a writer to achieve.
author: Pat McIntosh, The Stolen Voice

quote: It is easy to tell confidence from pride. Confidence lifts, encourages, helps, and is full of gratitude. Pride demeans, mocks, destroys, and is bitter and resentful.
author: Stacy Kramer, From What I Remember...

quote: Fighting to fit in. Confidence is paper thin.
author: David Levithan, Will Grayson, Will Grayson

quote: If someone is determined to kill himself, nothing will stop him.
author: Deyth Banger

quote: A brutal, relentless self-analysis lies at the heart of all despair.
author: James  Jones

quote: If the Gospels were truly the pattern of God’s activity, then defeat was only the beginning.
author: Roméo Dallaire

quote: No one is a failure until that is the only definition of themselves that they are willing to see within.
author: Kevin Leman, The Firstborn Advantage: Making Your Birth Order Work for You

quote: Knowingly or unknowingly, our past disappointments guide us positively and or negatively in our present day journey of life, based on how we see and use the lessons from our past!
author: Kilroy J. Oldster, Dead Toad Scrolls

quote: The reason placing blame repeatedly fails to work is that I repeatedly place it on everyone else instead of where it actually belongs.
author: Chris Guillebeau, The Happiness of Pursuit: Finding the Quest That Will Bring Purpose to Your Life

quote: We are some combination of strengths and weaknesses, virtues and less-than-virtuous inclinations. Greed, selfishness and pride are often co-conspirators planning their return just beyond the surface of our consciousness.
author: Cass R. Sunstein

quote: The phoenix must burn to emerge
author: Brent Schlender, Becoming Steve Jobs: The Evolution of a Reckless Upstart into a Visionary Leader

quote: Life is like a roller coaster. Ups and downs are just part of the ride.
author: Prince Akwarandu

quote: Good habits are the key to all success. Bad habits are the unlocked door to failure.
author: Auliq-Ice

quote: Fatigue, discomfort, discouragement are merely symptoms of effort.
author: C.S. Lewis

quote: We get success by hard work and failure by hard luck
author: Thomas Bernhard

quote: It is much more enjoyable to love success than to hate failure.
author: Marsha Blackburn

quote: Life is all of failures with a limited amount of success
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Most people do not want much. All they want is to be envied by most people.
author: John W. Gardner

quote: Don’t stop when you fail. Instead, use your failures to measure your level of success.
author: Garth Risk Hallberg, City on Fire

quote: With diligent, you will master the act.
author: a promise that you make to yourself to keep moving forward.

quote: Discouragement is the cancer of great things.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: As long as we confider failure as an option, success is not going to be the only one choice.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Failures are in the positions they are in today because they are yet to follow the footprints of those who walk, think, and breathe success.
author: Anne Ursu, The Real Boy

quote: All men and women flee from the witnesses of their wrongdoings.
author: Auliq Ice

quote: Today he failed to change the world. As for tomorrow, who can tell?
author: James A. Michener, Hawaii

quote: Failures sit around and wait for good things to come to them; winners work until good things happen to them, and still continue to work.
author: Maddy Malhotra, How to Build Self-Esteem and Be Confident: Overcome Fears, Break Habits, Be Successful and Happy

quote: Lack of commitment — is the main reason for failure among Christian leaders
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: Failure is only a step towards success.
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: There are no easy paths in this life. And when troubles arise, we must face them with the same dignity as we do success.
I was just past forty, that age when you wake up in the morning and feel something thickening inside and only people too old to matter refer to you as a young man anymore. (The Last Days of Il Duce)
author: Mark Batterson, A Trip Around the Sun: Turning Your Everyday Life Into the Adventure of a Lifetime

quote: The reason why a person does not have success can be found inside him. It is his worldview, conscience, and perception of life
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: Often what we struggle with becomes the foundation of our greatest success.
author: Russell Eric Dobda

quote: To buy excuses, a person must sell his dream.
author: Unarine Ramaru

quote: Had I really succeeded at anything else, I might never have found the determination to succeed in the one arena where I believed I truly belonged.
author: Hunter S. Thompson, Ancient Gonzo Wisdom: Interviews with Hunter S. Thompson

quote: Failure to a positively programmed mind is nothing but an opportunity to carefully try again with a more strategic approach.
author: Jerry Seinfeld

quote: You can’t let the fear of failure keep you from taking the risks that you know are the right ones to take.
author: Thomas Ligotti, My Work is Not Yet Done: Three Tales of Corporate Horror

quote: Failure is only an option
author: Laurence Sterne, The Life and Opinions of Tristram Shandy, Gentleman

quote: Nothing good ever comes out of hurry and frustration, only misery.
author: Auliq Ice

quote: Embrace your imperfections.Fancy your flaws.Flaunt your blemishes.Adore your birthmarks.Laugh off glitches.Discuss your setbacks.Don’t call your mistakes ‘Regrets’Call them ‘Lessons
author: A.J. Darkholme, Rise of the Morningstar

quote: You can’t always get it right, if you fail, and it will happen, accept it, jump back on and try again
author: A.J. Darkholme, Rise of the Morningstar

quote: Fail early as much you can so that you can succeed early as much you can.
author: Micha van Randen

quote: All people who made it at one time thought they could never make it.
author: Stella Adler, The Art of Acting

quote: It’s not about money or connections — it’s the willingness to outwork and out-learn everyone… And if it fails, you learn from what happened and do a better job next time
author: Richelle E. Goodrich, Making Wishes

quote: If you meet a number of failures the causes of which are not known, look for something that is common for each failure and that is never present when there is a success.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: If you never fail, that means you never tried to do something impossible.
author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quote: Be a pro at what you do. No one shows-up to meetings of the Unsuccessful Skydivers Club.
author: Noel DeJesus

quote: Do not dwell on past failures or it will ruin your future.
author: M. James Airey

quote: We all make mistakes. It is important to learn from them and just as important to know when to move on.
author: T Jay Taylor

quote: Sometimes coping with the difficulties success brings is much more difficult than coping with the difficulties failure brings!
author: David P. Ingerson

quote: Jumping from failure to failure with undiminished enthusiasm is the big secret to success.
author: Kiera Van Gelder, The Buddha and the Borderline: My Recovery from Borderline Personality Disorder through Dialectical Behavior Therapy, Buddhism, and Online Dating

quote: Never give up your right to be wrong, and be sure to give others that right too.
author: John F. Kennedy

quote: I do not fear failure. I only fear the "slowing up" of the engine inside of me which is pounding, saying, "Keep going, someone must be on top, why not you?
author: A. Whitney Brown

quote: The capacity to surmount failure without being discouraged is the chief asset of every person who attains outstanding success in any calling.
author: Noel DeJesus

quote: Yet so often it seems that victory eludes us. It is when our self-confidence is finally destroyed and is replaced with dependence upon God that we have victory.
author: Nabil N. Jamal

quote: God has provided you with many avenues for obtaining wisdom and averting failure. Resist your inclination to accept advice with easy solutions and to reject help that requires a more difficult path.
author: Peter S. Beagle, The Last Unicorn

quote: Success is not an end in itself. It should be a means to an end - happiness. If success does not lead to happiness, it is called "failure".
author: Ziad K. Abdelnour, Economic Warfare: Secrets of Wealth Creation in the Age of Welfare Politics

quote: Within a month he knew that his marriage was a failure
author: Victor L. Wooten, The Music Lesson: A Spiritual Search for Growth Through Music

quote: Emotional pain, physical damage, financial weakness are the reasons to stop for a while and not forever.
author: Michelle Sagara, Cast in Shadow

quote: Overcast does not always forecast rain neither does difficulty always forecast failure.
author: always move forward.

quote: After all is said and done, I believe the true measure of success is how many times you can bounce back from failure.
author: Arlin Sailesh Kapadia

quote: Failure fear people who pursue success, cause their bravery to become successful is far more than failure to understand.
author: Ziad K. Abdelnour, Economic Warfare: Secrets of Wealth Creation in the Age of Welfare Politics

quote: When we confuse the needs with the desires
author: Lillielyse Monsel

quote: Everything has a finsh line. You just have to keep moving forward until you cross it.
author: adelaja precious

quote: I counsel you, put down in record even your doubts and surmises. Hereafter it may be of interest to you to see how true you guess. We learn from failure, not from success.
author: Dave Donovan, The Gift

quote: Shouldering the blame for failure and conferring credit where it is due comes rarely to most.
author: Susan Shapiro Barash, Tripping the Prom Queen: The Truth About Women and Rivalry

quote: The reason God never fails is because he fears to fail
author: Samuel McChord Crothers

quote: Because human nature never changes.
author: Milan Kundera, The Unbearable Lightness of Being

quote: A son is an unfulfilled man’s last attempt to fulfill his unfulfilled dreams.
author: George W. Bush, Decision Points

quote: A worthy failure is more valuable than a mediocre success.
author: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

quote: It is a misfortune to be in the presence of a writer, even a failed writer, to be seen by him, be his passing study and remain in his corrupt memory. It is like the insult of a corpse on the road by a war photographer.
author: Dean Koontz, Odd Interlude: A Special Odd Thomas Adventure

quote: The definition of brilliance is redoing failures different each time and expecting successful results.
author: Richelle E. Goodrich, Smile Anyway

quote: Her cowardice had been re-branded as self-preservation, and she was grateful for it.
author: accept it and try again.

quote: Resilience is not a commodity you are born with, waiting silently on tap. It is self-manufactured painstakingly over time by working through your problems and never giving up, even in the face of difficulty or failure.
author: Steven Pressfield, The War of Art: Break Through the Blocks & Win Your Inner Creative Battles

quote: Failure is our greatest teacherBlame blinds us to her lessons
author: Genevieve Ross

quote: Mind your business" had been the motto of her childhood. But now that seemed like a failing in a friend.
author: William  Boyd, Any Human Heart

quote: Nowadays the standards had plummeted so far that I failed even at being a failure. I silently packed up. Nothing else was left. They had even robbed me of self-pity
author: Ray Bradbury

quote: The future vibrated with uncertainty. I had failed. I had ignorance. I had hope.
author: Wayde Goodall, Why Great Men Fall: 15 Winning Strategies to Rise Above It All

quote: Never having been able to succeed in the world, he took his revenge by speaking ill of it.
author: Arthur Conan Doyle, The Captain of the Pole-Star and Other Stories

quote: To make the fastest progress,Be an absolutely cheerfulHero-warriorAnd take both victory and failureAs parallel experience riversLeading to the sea Of progress-delight.
author: Sri Chinmoy, The Wings of Joy: Finding Your Path to Inner Peace

quote: The man who has done his level best…is a success, even though the world write him down a failure.
author: Joshua Wisenbaker

quote: A series of failures may culminate in the best possible result.
author: Bernadette Pajer, Fatal Induction: A Professor Bradshaw Mystery

quote: God’s desire is to reveal Himself to everyone, yet He will manifest Himself only to those who love Him.
author: Trisha Ashley, Good Husband Material

quote: The consequences of seeking popularity is not only the chronic feeling of lonliness, but a desire to hide your face from the eyes of the universe.
author: Emily Arden, Lie to me: Deception: Book Two

quote: Amongst it all my soul craved one thing, Love, for it was the beginning and end of anything that will ever truly matter.
author: David Weber, Oath of Swords

quote: The desire not to be anything is the desire not to be.
author: Heidi Reagan

quote: Desire is a great virtue, but expectation is an even greater vice.
author: Adi Da Samraj, The Eating Gorilla Comes in Peace: The Transcendental Principle of Life Applied to Diet and the Regenerative Discipline of True Health

quote: I barely brushed towards her cheek as I moved towards her mouth, her nails tickled my chest, driving me insane. Kissing her became my single reason for breathing.
author: Isaac Marion

quote: You can make a text mean anything, especially if it’s old and full of ambiguities.
author: Jim Butcher, Proven Guilty

quote: It was the freedom to experiment that made this experiment called Freedom possible.
author: Beth Yarnall, Wake Up Maggie

quote: I am so often the architect of my own pain and the engineer of my own failures.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: The shortest and the hardest journey to make is the inner one.
author: Ally Condie, Reached

quote: There is no fault, only responsibility.
author: Doreen Virtue, The Yo-Yo Diet Syndrome: How to Heal and Stabilize Your Appetite and Weight

quote: Strength does not come in those times when you hit the mark
author: Jennifer Wixson

quote: Let us, with songs of praise, embrace the sacred year.
author: Texas Bix Bender

quote: You have to push through every difficulty to achieve the goal.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

quote: First! Does this need to be said? Second! Does this need to be said by me? And third! Does this need to be said by me right now?
author: Horace, Arte poética

quote: As days are numbered and life is short, why waste days feeling bad for yourself?
author: Connor Franta, A Work in Progress

quote: Self acceptance is common, Unfortunately, for some daft reason you are expected to have some kind of psychology degree to learn it.
author: Dennis Merritt Jones, Your Redefining Moments: Becoming Who You Were Born to Be

quote: No other love on earth would ever equate to the unconditional one that could come from you to you.
author: second one is not. First one is for your mental healthiness and well-being while the second one is to mess up with other peoples’ peace of mind to serve your own needs.

quote: Self-love is meant to be your foundation. It is your birthright. Once you get it – once you really feel what it is like to love yourself… to fall in love with yourself – you might never want to leave this stage.
author: Annette Vaillancourt, How to Manifest Your Soulmate with Eft: Relationship as a Spiritual Path

quote: Shine brightly, so you can help those who have not found their path a way through the darkness.
author: Carrie Ryan, Slasher Girls & Monster Boys

quote: When an officer finds themselves arresting pastors that are feeding people who have nothing, they should know they’re on the wrong side.
author: Carla H. Krueger, The Social Worker

quote: There’s a very fine line between being broke and being humble.
author: Hannah Kent, Burial Rites

quote: Poverty was not created by God. It is we who have caused it, you and I through our egotism.
author: Christa Wolf, City of Angels or Overcoat of Dr. Freud

quote: Blessed are the ones who offer coffee to writers, for they will get all the rewards mentioned in the Bible, the Quran, the Vedas, the Upanishads and the Bhagavad Gita.
author: Robin Sacredfire

quote: We all just need to be real. That is what will save us.
author: A.D. Posey

quote: If it’s not gonna matter tomorrow, it shouldn’t matter today.
author: A.D. Posey

quote: Stories have the ability to take us inside all kinds of life.
author: Christopher Bram, Eminent Outlaws: The Gay Writers Who Changed America

quote: Time and tide and the ravages of sin take their toll on the most noble achievements of man.
author: Billy Graham, Billy Graham in Quotes

quote: Many of the wicked are receiving their wages now. Many Christians who may not be succeeding according to the world’s standards now, will reap great rewards in heaven.
author: Billy Graham, Billy Graham in Quotes

quote: God measures people by the small dimensions of humility and not by the bigness of their achievements or the size of their capabilities.
author: Billy Graham, Billy Graham in Quotes

quote: I am becoming aware of the truth that people change people as much as ideas change people.The power of personality is strong . . . often personality is greater than the idea.
author: Billy Graham, Billy Graham in Quotes

quote: Instead of manipulating [people] for our own purposes, we’d help them achieve what is best for them. We’d also try to see life through their eyes. Treat others the way you would want them to treat you.
author: Billy Graham, Billy Graham in Quotes

quote: Our world is obsessed with success. But how does God define success? Success in God’s eyes is faithfulness to His calling.
author: Billy Graham, Billy Graham in Quotes

quote: O blessed be the grace that makes advantages of my corruptions, even to contradict and kill themselves (648).
author: Richard Baxter

quote: Grace shows that the Christian race is God’s race.
author: Thaddeus of Vitovnica

quote: Waiting accentuates our helplessness, ant that is what God seems committed to revealing. Only when we know ourselves to be helpless do we fully experience his grace and glory. We have to wait for it.
author: Brittany L. Engels, Kaptito Kero

quote: How much better it would be, she thinks, if the world were ruled by chance and not a God.
author: Tess Gerritsen

quote: The control of information makes history.
author: John Green, The Fault in Our Stars

quote: As man becomes more technologically advanced, his barbarity becomes even more lethal
author: Darmie O-Lujon

quote: Man cannot spend all his time doing evil, and even in the company of pirates there must be some sweet moments on their sinister ship when you feel as if you were aboard a pleasure yacht.
author: Marguerite Yourcenar, Memoirs of Hadrian

quote: Consciousness is the awareness that emerges out of the dialectical tension between possibilities and limitations.
author: Jay Woodman

quote: We are therefore constantly on the road, straying from one mental image to the next, and identify with these images, and derive our identity from the images.
author: Fyodor Dostoyevsky

quote: There is a rationale for every action.
author: bell hooks, All About Love: New Visions

quote: Idealism + Inaction = Depression
author: Gail Carriger, Manners & Mutiny

quote: Any officer who goes into action without his sword is improperly armed.
author: Innocent Mwatsikesimbe, Mirror

quote: The door to success may be a few steps away but you still have to walktowards it.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: Habits of action cultivated early in life lay the foundation for unique skill sets able to carve a path beyond the mundane and into the relevant.
author: Aristotle, The Nicomachean Ethics

quote: Difference between a successful and an unsuccessful person is not the action but the vision.

quote: Until the end of time, living happily will remain your sole responsibility on earth.
Many people see their problems to be permanent because they continue to face them with the same mental attitudes that created them.
The unexpected will occur, but in the end, your life will never seize to become what you continuously make of it.
Why worry about your problem when all it calls for is an effective solution?
No one has ever achieved financial success by constantly spending all they have in order to deceive others into believing they are rich.
Those who constantly work on their positive desires, know nothing about wishing.
Working hard gets you started
I work consistently hard and smart because I understand that I can only flourish by contributing positively to the universe through my daily decisions and actions.
The journey to success makes prisoners of those who see adversities as dead-end roads.
What is the essence of having a mind, but yet living through the opinions of others?
Only those who seek within, get to discover their true unconditional happiness.
You were born with the seeds of success and happiness, but nobody else but yourself could plant them in your life.
The road to success is very tough, but your mind is tougher.
You are too blessed to be holding on to people and things that hold you back in life.
Some people have two full-time jobs: Working to support their lifestyles and creating illusions to impress the society and their peers.
Your life is too big of a celebration to dare to permit anyone or anything to ruin it.
The habit of talking the talk has distracted many people from walking the walk.
A lot of people have attained financial success in the negative and positive directions, but we are yet to see anyone achieve a happy life in the negative direction.
Never permit anyone to interfere with your bond with happiness.
The moment you start to positively control your thoughts and beliefs, would be the day that nothing or no one would ever again succeed in controlling your destiny.
Living life without a positive purpose, is like setting forth on a journey without a specific destination in mind.
A complicated life is a permanent home for stress.
No one can take your joy away from you, unless you willingly give it to them through repeated negative interpretations of your experiences.
It is by falling and getting back up that you learn not to fall very often.
Money can buy you attention, but it can never buy you true respect.
The greatest love that you could ever experience on earth is the one that only comes from you to you.
Where you stand at this very moment is nothing compared to where you could be in the future if you start pushing hard and long enough regardless of your past and present circumstances.
In every endeavor, you owe it to yourself to always push until the door of opportunity of opens.
Life never seizes to have a brighter side of it. Unfortunately, many are blindfolded from seeing it because they are fully focused on its dark side.
The best is yet to come, but you must first put in your very best.
Why fight a battle alone when you can fight it victoriously with God on the lead?
Never allow the blessings in your life to go consciously and subconsciously unnoticed, no matter how small they are.
No matter what your religion is, be sure that it teaches you to treat other people as you would expect them to treat you in return. There is a great joy in peace and unity.
If you are a good parent, please continue to be a good one. But if you are bad parent, today is a great new beginning for you to start a great new chapter of parenthood.
Your life can only be as good or as bad as you frequently interpret it to be.
Just like breathing and eating, having gratitude for your big and small blessings is another thing that you should never live your life without.
The journey is never over until you stop pushing. Focus on the prize and keep striving. You truly deserve some bigger and better blessings.
Stop making some excuses why you are unhappy with your life, and start finding some reasons why you should be happy with the gift of life that you have.
Nothing can succeed in stopping a man that has mastered the infinite power of the subconscious mind from reaching the territory of greatness.
You have to first position yourself with the right level of mannerism, before others could see a reason to respect you.
Once your mind is in the right positive state, it would become impossible for you to go astray in life. But importantly, you have to let God stay on the lead.
For how long are you going to keep wasting your money, time, and energy trying to impress people who will never matter in your life?
In order for your dream to come into manifestation, you must first repeatedly envision its possibility in your mental imagination.
It is ok if negative people talk negatively about you
Life has never been about dwelling on the past negative chapters of your life; instead, it is about creating new fulfilling ones.
It would be a great disappointment for you to give up on yourself before the appointed time to reap the fruit of your labor.
It is almost impossible to live a life of failure if one learns to have faith in God and in oneself.
There is absolutely no shortcut to success other than paying the price that its prize demands.
Enjoy life while you still have it. No one knows their time of departure from the face of this earth. Therefore, be sure to always seize every moment that comes to you, and make it very memorable.
Be the positive light that the crowd follows
The crown of massive success is upon us all. Hold strong to your faith and continue to give your dreams your very best.
Some negative things in life will never change, but try not to let them change you.
In this world one must have a name; it prevents confusion, even when it does not establish identity. Some, though, are known by numbers, which also seem inadequate distinctions.
author: Haruki Murakami, Underground: The Tokyo Gas Attack and the Japanese Psyche

quote: Right thinking plus right action equals right results." ~ Dr. MaryAnn Diorio

quote: Alas! Alas!When in the skies there are no limitsonly the forceful perseverance of the mind stripping through cloudsand creating the ever so beautiful shades of abundant success.
author: Priscilla Koranteng, Trails to the Stream: Poetry and Inspiration for Everyday Living

quote: All possibilities I will attemptAnd as I am here now,Knowing what I know now,I have faith in myselfThat I will succeedAnd I will succeed.And I will succeed.

quote: Winter is coming.

quote: ... a comment with the idle arrogance common of such nobodies who have just come into a small bit of power.

quote: We are all the playground of angels and demons.

quote: She couldn’t get any farther away inside from her skin. She couldn’t get away.

quote: Inspiration is the most radiant and flourishing expression of our authenticity.

quote: Build a tangled bank.

quote: A country where God is not honored cannot be truly successful

quote: people ask me not to go out of league because I know they have a fear that i may get successful

quote: Total freedom from your past

quote: Do not follow the success do your best whatever you do so success will follow you

quote: To know God and to make Him known.
author: Oswald J. Smith

quote: They did not know it was impossible, so they did it. Mark Twain

quote: The most critical risk of all, is not taking the risk if means be dangerous.

quote: A man cannot be too careful in the choice of his enemies. I have not got one who is a fool.

quote: Sometimes those who challenge you most.. Teach you best.

quote: Always be challenged to build your life intentionally for possessions.

quote: Too much of anything is tiresome. Even the best things.

quote: Soon we will not need people anymore, as everything will be done by automatons, including bringing up children.

quote: Success is all about believing, always visualizing what you want to do and want to be and act accordingly on it until become it reality.

quote: One mistake is enough for all your life. So, where is the place of a mischief-maker?

quote: For success is for the ignorant That is what makes it original

quote: Haphazard actions don’t bring results!
author: Lorii Myers, No Excuses, The Fit Mind-Fit Body Strategy Book

quote: The greatest measure of success is the amount of joy you experience.

quote: Tedium is a dangerous thing, potentially lethal.
author: Samuel A. Aykroyd

quote: Some times losing a battle you find a new way to win the war By Donald Trump.
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: Life is a game, you either win or loose but there is no draw
author: William Makepeace Thackeray

quote: Meetings at work present great opportunities to showcase your talent. Do not let them go to waste.

quote: If you want to be successful, you have to surround yourself with successful people or successful minds

quote: If you must push yourself beyond your limits, push yourself hard enough for success.

quote: I keep turning over new leaves, and spoiling them, as I used to spoil my copybooks; and I make so many beginnings there never will be an end. (Jo March)

quote: Intuition is a sacred voice.

quote: Love makes things possible, not easy.

quote: You can call a thing possible which is still to happen, but not which has already taken place.

quote: It is a strange thing to realize... but our failures so often place us where we need to be.

quote: The eternal struggle between failure and fortune is a fight not between mortal enemies but sparring partners. So fortune is improved by failure, and the reverse is also true.
author: failure is a lesson.

quote: Constant exposure to dangers will breed contempt for them.

quote: From a distance it is something  and nearby it is nothing.

quote: There is often less danger in the things we fear than in the things we desire.

quote: The superpowers often behave like two heavily armed blind men feeling their way around a room  each believing himself in mortal peril from the other  whom he assumes to have perfect vision.

quote: Mountains appear more lofty the nearer they are approached  but great men resemble them not in this particular.

quote: Deep faith eliminates fear.
author: Anonymous

quote: If fear is cultivated it will become stronger. If faith is cultivated it will achieve the mastery ... faith is the stronger emotion because it is positive  whereas fear is negative.
author: Harry Emerson Fosdick

quote: Fear is the absence of faith.

quote: I will not fear  for you are ever with me  and you will never leave me to face my perils alone.

quote: Nothing recedes like success.

quote: The penalty of success is to be bored by people who used to snub you.

quote: Out of every fruition of success  no matter what  comes forth something to make a new effort necessary.

quote: High station in life is earned by the gallantry with which appalling experiences are survived with grace.
author: Victor Hugo

author: Winston Churchill

quote: It takes time to be a success  but time is all it takes.

quote: Success is not so much what you are  but rather what you appear to be.

quote: Damon Runyon. A day-coach boy in a parlor car seat.
author: Christopher Morley

quote: Vacillating people seldom succeed. They seldom win the solid respect of their fellows. Successful men and women are very careful in reaching decisions  and very persistent and determined in action thereafter.
author: John Stevenson

quote: The wise man puts all his eggs in one basket and watches the basket.
author: Frank Lloyd Wright

quote: The secret of success in life is for a man to be ready for his opportunity when it comes.
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote: A double-minded man is unstable in all his ways.... A determinate purpose in life and a steady adhesion to it through all disadvantages are indispensable conditions of success.
author: Marcus Annaeus Seneca

quote: I studied the lives of great men and famous women  and I found that the men and women who got to the top were those who did the jobs they had in hand  with everything they had of energy and enthusiasm and hard work.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Find a need and fill it.
author: Swami Sivananda

quote: Success follows doing what you want to do. There is no other way to be successful.
author: Helen Hayes

quote: Self-trust is the first secret of success.
author: Henry Ford

quote: The most important single ingredient in the formula of success is knowing how to get along with people.

quote: No matter how much a man can do  no matter how engaging his personality may be  he will not advance far in business if he cannot work through others.
author: Ben Johnson

quote: Whatever your grade or position  if you know how and when to speak  and when to remain silent  your chances of real success are proportionately increased.
author: Mary Field Belenky

quote: You have to block everything out and be extremely focused and be relaxed and mellow too.
author: Ingrid Bergman

quote: Since everything is in our heads  we better not lose them.
author: Bliss Carman

quote: People are subject to moods  to temptations and fears  lethargy and aberration and ignorance  and the staunchest qualities shift under the stresses and strains of daily life.
author: Martina Navratilova

quote: Sometimes success is due less to ability than to zeal.
author: George Matthew Adams

quote: Morale is the greatest single factor in successful wars.
author: Marshal Ferdinand Foch

quote: The real secret of success is enthusiasm. Yes  more than enthusiasm  I would say excitement. I like to see men get excited. When they get excited  they make a success of their lives.
author: General Douglas MacArthur

quote: Man never rises to great truths without enthusiasm.
author: Charles Buxton

quote: Do it big or stay in bed.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: If you want to succeed  you must make your own opportunities as you go.
author: Francis Bacon

quote: Man is still responsible. ... His success lies not with the stars  but with himself. He must carry on the fight of self-correction and discipline.
author: Edgar Watson Howe

quote: If  after all  men cannot always make history have a meaning  they can always act so that their own lives have one.
author: Miguel de Cervantes

quote: If the risk-reward ratio is right  you can make big money buying trouble.
author: Claude McDonald

quote: All great reforms require one to dare a lot to win a little.
author: Charles Lutwidge Dodgson

quote: He that would have fruit must climb the tree.
author: A. P. Gouthey

quote: The method of the enterprising is to plan with audacity and execute with vigor.
author: Herodotus

quote: No one reaches a high position without daring.
author: Ralph Kiner

quote: What is more mortifying than to feel that you have missed the plum for want of courage to shake the tree?
author: Euripides

quote: Who dares nothing  need hope for nothing.
author: George R. Gissing

quote: It takes vision and courage to create- it takes faith and courage to prove.
author: Cardinal James Gibbons

quote: Courage permits the caliber of performance to continue at its peak  until the finish line is crossed.
author: Herbert Kaufman

quote: You will never do anything in this world without courage.
author: Anne Morrow Lindbergh

quote: Whenever you see a successful business  someone once made a courageous decision.
author: Cookie Lavagetto

quote: One of the biggest factors in success is the courage to undertake something.
author: Joanna Field

quote: Nothing worthwhile comes easily. Half effort does not produce half results. It produces no results. Work  continuous work and hard work  is the only way to accomplish results that last.
author: Wes Izzard

quote: Success is dependent on effort.
author: Anonymous

quote: Excellence in any pursuit is the late  ripe fruit of toil.
author: Diane Sawyer

quote: It is no use saying "we are doing our best." You have got to succeed in doing what is necessary.
author: Jane Addams

quote: The lesser evil is also evil.
author: Ida White Parker

quote: Noble deeds and hot baths are the best cures for depression.
author: Raymond L. Cox

quote: I place a high moral value on the way people behave. I find it repellent to have a lot  and to behave with anything other than courtesy in the old sense of the word-politeness of the heart  a gentleness of the spirit.
author: Sophie Tucker

quote: Try not to become a man of success  but rather a man of value.
author: Landrum P. Leavell

quote: Character is the real foundation of all worthwhile success.
author: Samuel Butler

quote: An error gracefully acknowledged is a victory won.
author: Cardinal de Retz

quote: I am not the smartest or most talented person in the world  but I succeeded because I keep going  and going  and going.
author: Napoleon Bonaparte

quote: It never pays to deal with the flyweights of the world. They take far too much pleasure in thwarting you at every turn.
author: Frank Lloyd Wright

quote: I am not afraid of the pen  or the scaffold  or the sword. I will tell the truth whenever I please.
author: Kitty Kelley

quote: If you wish success in life  make perseverance your bosom friend.
author: Julie Andrews

quote: If you rest  you rust.
author: Shelley Long

quote: The heights by great men reached and kept Were not attained by sudden flight  But they  while their companions slept Were toiling upward in the night.
author: Harrison Ford

quote: Four steps to achievement: plan purposefully  prepare prayerfully  proceed positively  pursue persistently.
author: Benjamin Disraeli

quote: Flaming enthusiasm  backed up by horse sense and persistence  is the quality that most frequently makes for success.
author: Robert W. Service

quote: Big shots are only little shots who keep shooting.
author: Lisa M. Amos

quote: Plodding wins the race.
author: William J. H. Boetcker

quote: A winner never quits  and a quitter never wins.
author: Willie Mays

quote: It takes time to be a success.
author: Monty Hall

quote: Success generally depends upon knowing how long it takes to succeed.
author: Eddie Cantor

quote: Our business in life is not to get ahead of others but to get ahead of ourselves-to break our own records  to outstrip our yesterdays by our today  to do our work with more force than ever before.
author: Michael Korda

quote: Survival is triumph enough.
author: John Wooden

quote: The conventional army loses if it does not win. The guerrilla wins if he does not lose.
author: B. C. Forbes

quote: On earth we have nothing to do with success or results  but only with being true to God  and for God. Defeat in doing right is nevertheless victory.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Different people have different duties assigned to them by Nature  Nature has given one the power or the desire to do this  the other that. Each bird must sing with his own throat.
author: Abraham Maslow

quote: Nature magically suits a man to his fortunes  by making them the fruit of his character.
author: William A. Hulbert

quote: A man can do only what he can do. But if he does that each day he can sleep at night and do it again the next day.
author: Jacqueline Briskin

quote: Ask yourself the secret of your success. Listen to your answer  and practice it.
author: Edward Everett Hale

quote: We can never give up the belief that good guys always win. And that we are the good guys.
author: Olive Schreiner

quote: Success is a journey  not a destination.
author: Muriel Rukeyser

quote: The man who goes fishing gets something more than the fish he catches.
author: Max Lerner

quote: The reward of the general is not a bigger tent  but command.
author: Ursula K. LeGuin

quote: It has never been  and never will be  easy work! But the road that is built in hope is more pleasant to the traveler than the road built in despair  even though they both lead to the same destination.
author: Daniel L. Reardon

quote: The reward of a thing well done is to have done it.
author: Blaise Pascal

quote: We should scarcely desire things ardently if we were perfectly acquainted with what we desire.
author: Abraham Lincoln

quote: Need and struggle are what excite and inspire us  our hour of triumph is what brings the void.
author: John Steinbeck

quote: Happiness is to be found along the way  not at the end of the road  for then the journey is over and it is too late.
author: Anonymous

quote: Success has killed more men than bullets.
author: Ambrose Bierce

quote: The problems of victory are more agreeable than those of defeat  but they are no less difficult.
author: Johann von Goethe

quote: Unless a man has been taught what to do with success after getting it  the achievement of it must inevitably leave him a prey to boredom.
author: Lily Tomlin

quote: The two hardest things to handle in life are failure and success.
author: Liv Ullmann

quote: Out of every fruition of success  no matter what  comes forth something to make a new effort necessary.
author: Irving Berlin

quote: Nothing except a battle lost can be half so melancholy as a battle won.
author: Irving Kristol

quote: Our desires always increase with our possessions. The knowledge that something remains yet unenjoyed impairs our enjoyment of the good before us.
author: Grant Tinker

quote: Pray that success will not come any faster than you are able to endure it.
author: Brendan Francis

quote: Adversity is sometimes hard upon a man  but for one man who can stand prosperity  there are a hundred that will stand adversity.
author: Maxine Hong Kingston

quote: Success is getting what you want  happiness is wanting what you get.
author: Corita Kent

quote: He has achieved success  who has lived well  laughed often  and loved much  who has gained the respect of intelligent men and the love of little children.
author: Danny Thomas

quote: Success is the sweetest revenge.
author: Thomas Wolfe

quote: The ultimate of being successful is the luxury of giving yourself the time to do what you want to do.
author: Jeanne Moreau

quote: Success is a great healer.
author: Robert Henri

quote: The exclusive worship of the bitch-goddess Success is our national disease.
author: Joseph Roux

quote: Fame has only the span of the day  they say. But to live in the hearts of people-that is worth something.
author: William P. King

quote: Success is like a liberation  or the first phase of a love affair.
author: Daniel Webster

quote: The best place to succeed is where you are with what you have.
author: George Bernard Shaw

quote: When there is no feeling of accomplishment  children fail to develop properly and old people rapidly decline.
author: Dr. Joyce Brothers

quote: Victory at all costs  victory in spite of all terror  victory however long and hard the hard may be  for without victory there is no survival.
author: General Omar N. Bradley

quote: The only time you find success before work is in the dictionary.
author: D. O. Flynn

quote: As soon as you find the key to success  somebody always changes the lock.
author: Lady Nancy Astor

quote: Behold the turtle. He makes progress only when he sticks his neck out.
author: W. C. Fields

quote: Sleep  riches  and health  to be truly enjoyed  must be interrupted.
author: Al Bernstein

quote: Ideas are like rabbits. You get a couple and learn how to handle them  and pretty soon you have a dozen.
author: Thomas Jefferson

quote: Success can make you go one of two ways. It can make you a prima donna  or it can smooth the edges  take away the insecurities  let the nice things come out.
author: Christian Nestell Bovee

quote: I have always observed that to succeed in the world one should appear like a fool but be wise.
author: Charles Wesley

quote: To climb steep hills Requires slow pace at first.
author: Edgar A. Guest

quote: I have trodden the winepress alone.
author: Napoleon

quote: No obstacle is greater than power within you.
author: Charlie Chaplin

quote: Gloria was still talking, something about how shooting people was in a sense safer than making art, in terms of avoiding serious lapses in taste.
author: David Chiles

quote: Integrity and blame can never be friends.
author: Elizabeth Gilbert, Eat, Pray, Love

quote: No. She told me she was going to marry him, to get French nationality . . . She was obsessed with getting a nationality...
author: Mary Wollstonecraft Shelley, Frankenstein

quote: The most essential step in marketing your services is selecting an occupation you can throw yourself into wholeheartedly.
author: T.A. Uner, The Leopard Apocalypse

quote: Creativity is making regret free mistakes, Wisdom is knowing which ones have value
author: Mark W. Boyer

quote: He wanted to tell the baby that Paris was like a poem in stone.
author: Laura Florand, The Chocolate Touch

quote: Truth will not afford sufficient food to their vanity; so they have betaken, themselves to errour. Truth, Sir, is a cow which will yield such people no more milk, and so they are gone to milk the bull.
author: Jane Austen, Persuasion
